 10547                                  ;============================================================================
 10548                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) CODE SEGMENT 
 10549                                  ;============================================================================
 10550                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10551                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 10552                                  
 10553                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0 
 10554                                  
 10555                                  ; 30/12/2022
 10556                                  ; (BIOSCODE SEGMENT is 2CCh for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)  -- ((25C0h+700h)>>4) --
 10557                                  
 10558                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
 10559                                   
 10560                                  ; 02/10/2022
 10561                                  
 10562                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
 10563                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10564                                  ; MSBIO1.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 10565                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10566                                  
 10567                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
 10568 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
 10569 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
 10570                                  
 10571                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10572                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
 10573                                  ; 09/12/2022
 10574                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
 10575                                  
 10576                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10577                                  
 10578                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10579                                  ; 20/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 10580                                  
 10581                                  ;************************************************************************
 10582                                  ;*									*
 10583                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
 10584                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
 10585                                  ;*									*
 10586                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
 10587                                  ;*									*
 10588                                  ;************************************************************************
 10589                                  
 10590                                  	; 20/09/2023	
 10591                                  	; 10/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 10592                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0032h 
 10593                                  
 10594                                  _seg_reinit:
 10595 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 10596                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
 10597                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
 10598 00000037 BF[0406]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
 10599                                  		;mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
 10600                                  		; 10/08/2023
 10601 0000003A B90300                  		mov	cx, 3 ; (PCDOS 7.1)
 10602                                  _seg_reinit_1:
 10603 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
 10604 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
 10605 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
 10606 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
 10607                                  		; 10/08/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 10608                                  		; (direct jump to i2f_handler from BIOSDATA:bios_i2f)
 10609                                  		; (instead of 'bcode_i2f: dw i2f_handler, IOSYSCODESEG')
 10610 00000042 26A3[0800]              		mov     [es:bios_i2f_seg], ax ; actual BIOSCODE segment
 10611                                  
 10612 00000046 CB                      		retf
 10613                                  
 10614                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10615                                  
 10616                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10617                                  
 10618                                  ;************************************************************************
 10619                                  ;*									*
 10620                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
 10621                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
 10622                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
 10623                                  ;*									*
 10624                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
 10625                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
 10626                                  ;*									*
 10627                                  ;************************************************************************
 10628                                  
 10629                                  		; 20/09/2023
 10630                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
 10631 00000047 56                      		push	si
 10632 00000048 50                      		push	ax
 10633 00000049 51                      		push	cx
 10634 0000004A 52                      		push	dx
 10635 0000004B 57                      		push	di
 10636 0000004C 55                      		push	bp
 10637 0000004D 1E                      		push	ds
 10638 0000004E 06                      		push	es
 10639 0000004F 53                      		push	bx
 10640 00000050 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
 10641 00000052 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
 10642                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
 10643                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 10644 00000055 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 10645                                  		; 20/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:005Ah)
 10646 0000005A C434                    		les	si, [si]
 10647                                  		;mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
 10648 0000005C 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
 10649 0000005E A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
 10650 00000061 8826[8004]              		mov	[printdev], ah
 10651                                  		;mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
 10652 00000065 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
 10653 00000069 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
 10654 0000006D 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
 10655 00000071 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
 10656 00000075 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
 10657                                  		; 17/10/2022
 10658 00000079 81FE[6F05]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
 10659                                  		;;cmp	si, 579h	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 10660                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
 10661                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
 10662 0000007D 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
 10663                                  
 10664                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
 10665                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
 10666                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
 10667                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
 10668                                  ;
 10669                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
 10670                                  ;
 10671                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
 10672                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
 10673                                  ;	  it has been used.
 10674                                  ;
 10675                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
 10676                                  
 10677                                  		; 20/09/2023
 10678                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
 10679 0000007F C706[9C04]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
 10680 00000085 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
 10681 00000088 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
 10682 0000008A 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
 10683                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
 10684                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
 10685 0000008E 8916[9C04]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
 10686 00000092 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
 10687                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
 10688                                  no_sector32_mapping:
 10689 00000096 97                      		xchg	ax, di
 10690 00000097 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
 10691 0000009B 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 10692 0000009E 732B                    		jnb	short command_error
 10693 000000A0 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
 10694 000000A1 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 10695 000000A3 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 10696 000000A5 97                      		xchg	ax, di
 10697 000000A6 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
 10698 000000AA FC                      		cld
 10699                                  		; 17/10/2022
 10700 000000AB 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
 10701                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
 10702 000000AF 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
 10703 000000B1 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
 10704                                  already_got_ah_status:
 10705                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022
 10706                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 10707                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
 10708 000000B3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 10709                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
 10710 000000B8 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 10711 000000BC 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
 10712                                  					; mark operation complete
 10713 000000BF 5B                      		pop	bx
 10714 000000C0 07                      		pop	es
 10715 000000C1 1F                      		pop	ds
 10716 000000C2 5D                      		pop	bp
 10717 000000C3 5F                      		pop	di
 10718 000000C4 5A                      		pop	dx
 10719 000000C5 59                      		pop	cx
 10720 000000C6 58                      		pop	ax
 10721 000000C7 5E                      		pop	si
 10722                                  		;add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
 10723                                  		; 20/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1	- IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00C8h)
 10724 000000C8 44                      		inc	sp
 10725 000000C9 44                      		inc	sp	
 10726                                  
 10727                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
 10728                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
 10729                                  bc_retf:
 10730 000000CA CB                      		retf
 10731                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10732                                  
 10733                                  command_error:				
 10734 000000CB E80700                  		call	bc_cmderr
 10735 000000CE EBE3                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
 10736                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10737                                  ; 01/05/2019
 10738                                  
 10739                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10740                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
 10741                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
 10742                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
 10743                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
 10744                                  ; high.
 10745                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10746                                  
 10747                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
 10748                                  
 10749                                  		; 20/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 10750                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0D0h)
 10751                                  		; 15/10/2022
 10752                                  		;dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
 10753                                  
 10754 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
 10755                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
 10756                                  		
 10757                                  
 10758                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10759                                  
 10760                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
 10761                                  
 10762                                  bc_cmderr:				
 10763 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
 10764                                  					; unknown command error
 10765                                  
 10766                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10767                                  
 10768                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
 10769                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
 10770                                  
 10771                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
 10772                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
 10773                                  
 10774                                  bc_err_cnt:	
 10775                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
 10776                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10777 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
 10778 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
 10779                                  					; # of successful i/o's
 10780 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
 10781 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
 10782 000000E2 C3                      		retn
 10783                                  
 10784                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10785                                  
 10786                                  ;Bios_Code ends
 10787                                  
 10788                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10789                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 10790                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10791                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10792                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10793                                  
 10794                                  ; 30/04/2019
 10795                                  
 10796                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
 10797                                  
 10798                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
 10799                                  
 10800                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 10801                                  
 10802                                  ;************************************************************************
 10803                                  ;*									*
 10804                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
 10805                                  ;*									*
 10806                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
 10807                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
 10808                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
 10809                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
 10810                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
 10811                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
 10812                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
 10813                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
 10814                                  ;*									*
 10815                                  ;************************************************************************
 10816                                  
 10817                                  		; 20/09/2023
 10818                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00E3h)
 10819                                  		; 13/12/2022
 10820 000000E3 00                      		db 0
 10821                                  
 10822                                  		; 13/12/2022
 10823 000000E4 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
 10824                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
 10825 000000E5 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
 10826                                  					; 00 init
 10827 000000E7 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
 10828 000000E9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
 10829 000000EB [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
 10830                                  					; 03
 10831 000000ED [5C01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
 10832                                  					; 04
 10833 000000EF [9F01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
 10834                                  					; 05
 10835 000000F1 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
 10836 000000F3 [0802]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
 10837                                  					; 07
 10838 000000F5 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
 10839                                  					; 08
 10840 000000F7 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
 10841 000000F9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
 10842                                  con_table_end:
 10843 000000FB 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
 10844                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
 10845 000000FC [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
 10846 000000FE [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
 10847 00000100 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
 10848 00000102 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
 10849 00000104 [1902]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
 10850                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
 10851 00000106 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
 10852                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
 10853 00000108 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
 10854 0000010A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
 10855 0000010C [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
 10856 0000010E [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
 10857 00000110 [4F02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
 10858 00000112 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
 10859 00000114 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
 10860 00000116 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
 10861 00000118 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
 10862 0000011A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
 10863 0000011C [9402]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
 10864 0000011E [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
 10865 00000120 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
 10866 00000122 [C202]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
 10867 00000124 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
 10868 00000126 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
 10869 00000128 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
 10870 0000012A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
 10871 0000012C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
 10872 0000012E [F702]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
 10873                                  prn_table_end:
 10874 00000130 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
 10875                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
 10876 00000131 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
 10877 00000133 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
 10878 00000135 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
 10879 00000137 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
 10880 00000139 [1203]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
 10881 0000013B [3703]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
 10882 0000013D [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
 10883 0000013F [7803]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
 10884 00000141 [7F03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
 10885 00000143 [7F03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
 10886 00000145 [5703]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
 10887                                  aux_table_end:
 10888 00000147 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
 10889                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
 10890 00000148 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
 10891 0000014A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
 10892 0000014C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
 10893 0000014E [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
 10894 00000150 [E404]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
 10895 00000152 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
 10896 00000154 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
 10897 00000156 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
 10898 00000158 [E503]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
 10899 0000015A [E503]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
 10900                                  tim_table_end:
 10901                                  
 10902                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10903                                  
 10904                                  ;************************************************************************
 10905                                  ;*									*
 10906                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
 10907                                  ;*									*
 10908                                  ;************************************************************************
 10909                                  
 10910                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
 10911                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
 10912 0000015C E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
 10913                                  con_loop:				
 10914 0000015E E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
 10915 00000161 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
 10916 00000162 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
 10917                                  con_exit:				
 10918 00000164 F8                      		clc
 10919 00000165 C3                      		retn
 10920                                  
 10921                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10922                                  
 10923                                  ;************************************************************************
 10924                                  ;*									*
 10925                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
 10926                                  ;*									*
 10927                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
 10928                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
 10929                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
 10930                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
 10931                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
 10932                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
 10933                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
 10934                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
 10935                                  ;*									*
 10936                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
 10937                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
 10938                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
 10939                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
 10940                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
 10941                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
 10942                                  ;*									*
 10943                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
 10944                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
 10945                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
 10946                                  ;*									*
 10947                                  ;************************************************************************
 10948                                  
 10949                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10950                                  chrin:		
 10951 00000166 8A26[7E04]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
 10952 0000016A 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 10953 0000016C 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
 10954 00000170 08C0                    		or	al, al
 10955 00000172 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
 10956 00000174 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
 10957 00000176 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
 10958 00000178 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
 10959 0000017A 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
 10960 0000017D 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
 10961 0000017F B010                    		mov	al, 10h
 10962 00000181 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
 10963                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10964                                  
 10965                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
 10966                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
 10967                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
 10968                                  ;	 goto keyret
 10969                                  ;      else
 10970                                  ;	 set al to zero
 10971                                  ;	 goto alt_save
 10972                                  ;      endif
 10973                                  ;    endif
 10974                                  ;  endif
 10975                                  
 10976                                  alt_ext_chk:
 10977 00000183 803E[7E04]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
 10978 00000188 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
 10979 0000018A 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
 10980 0000018C 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
 10981 0000018E 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 10982 00000190 740C                    		jz	short keyret
 10983 00000192 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 10984 00000194 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
 10985                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10986                                  
 10987                                  not_ext:				
 10988 00000196 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
 10989 00000198 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
 10990                                  alt_save:				
 10991 0000019A 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
 10992                                  keyret:					
 10993 0000019E C3                      		retn
 10994                                  
 10995                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10996                                  
 10997                                  ;************************************************************************
 10998                                  ;*									*
 10999                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
 11000                                  ;*									*
 11001                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
 11002                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
 11003                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
 11004                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
 11005                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
 11006                                  ;*									*
 11007                                  ;************************************************************************
 11008                                  
 11009                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11010                                  con_rdnd:				
 11011 0000019F A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
 11012 000001A2 08C0                    		or	al, al
 11013 000001A4 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
 11014 000001A6 8A26[7F04]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
 11015 000001AA CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
 11016 000001AC 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
 11017 000001AE 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
 11018 000001B3 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
 11019 000001B5 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
 11020                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11021 000001B9 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
 11022                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
 11023 000001BE 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
 11024 000001C0 B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
 11025 000001C3 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
 11026 000001C5 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
 11027                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
 11028                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
 11029                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
 11030                                  z_bus_exit:				
 11031 000001C7 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
 11032 000001C8 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
 11033 000001CA C3                      		retn
 11034                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11035                                  
 11036                                  gotchr:					
 11037 000001CB 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
 11038 000001CD 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
 11039 000001CF 8A26[7E04]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
 11040 000001D3 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
 11041 000001D5 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
 11042                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11043                                  
 11044                                  notbrk:					
 11045 000001D7 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
 11046 000001DA 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
 11047 000001DC B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
 11048 000001DE EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
 11049                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11050                                  
 11051                                  rd_ext_chk:				
 11052 000001E0 803E[7E04]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
 11053 000001E5 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
 11054 000001E7 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
 11055 000001E9 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
 11056 000001EB 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
 11057 000001EE 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
 11058 000001F0 B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
 11059                                  					; change it for	compatibility
 11060                                  rdexit:					
 11061 000001F2 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
 11062 000001F6 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
 11063                                  					; return keyboard character here
 11064                                  bc_exvec:				
 11065 000001FA F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
 11066                                  					; indicate normal termination
 11067 000001FB C3                      		retn
 11068                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11069                                  
 11070                                  ;************************************************************************
 11071                                  ;*									*
 11072                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
 11073                                  ;*									*
 11074                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
 11075                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
 11076                                  ;*									*
 11077                                  ;************************************************************************
 11078                                  
 11079                                  con_writ:
 11080                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
 11081 000001FC E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
 11082                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11083                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
 11084                                  con_lp:					
 11085 000001FE 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
 11086 00000201 47                      		inc	di
 11087 00000202 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
 11088                                  					; AL = character to display
 11089 00000204 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
 11090                                  cc_ret:					
 11091 00000206 F8                      		clc
 11092 00000207 C3                      		retn
 11093                                  
 11094                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11095                                  
 11096                                  ;************************************************************************
 11097                                  ;*									*
 11098                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
 11099                                  ;*									*
 11100                                  ;************************************************************************
 11101                                  
 11102                                  con_flush:
 11103 00000208 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
 11104                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
 11105 0000020D B401                    		mov	ah, 1
 11106 0000020F CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
 11107                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
 11108                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
 11109                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
 11110 00000211 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
 11111 00000213 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 11112 00000215 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
 11113                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
 11114 00000217 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
 11115                                  
 11116                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11117                                  
 11118                                  ; 15/10/2022
 11119                                  
 11120                                  ;************************************************************************
 11121                                  ;*									*
 11122                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
 11123                                  ;*									*
 11124                                  ;************************************************************************
 11125                                  
 11126                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
 11127                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
 11128                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
 11129                                  
 11130                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
 11131                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
 11132                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
 11133                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
 11134                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
 11135                                  ;
 11136                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
 11137                                  
 11138                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 11139                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
 11140                                  
 11141                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11142                                  
 11143                                  ;************************************************************************
 11144                                  ;*									*
 11145                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
 11146                                  ;*									*
 11147                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
 11148                                  ;*									*
 11149                                  ;************************************************************************
 11150                                  
 11151                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
 11152 00000219 E8BBFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
 11153                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
 11154                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11155                                  prn_done:
 11156 0000021C F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
 11157 0000021D C3                      		retn
 11158                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11159                                  
 11160                                  ;************************************************************************
 11161                                  ;*									*
 11162                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
 11163                                  ;*									*
 11164                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
 11165                                  ;*									*
 11166                                  ;************************************************************************
 11167                                  
 11168                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
 11169                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
 11170 0000021E E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
 11171                                  prn_loop:				
 11172 00000220 BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
 11173                                  prn_out:				
 11174 00000223 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
 11175 00000226 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
 11176 00000228 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
 11177 0000022B 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 11178 0000022D E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
 11179 00000230 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
 11180 00000232 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
 11181 00000235 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
 11182 00000237 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
 11183 00000239 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
 11184 0000023E EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
 11185                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11186                                  
 11187                                  _prnwf:					
 11188 00000240 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
 11189 00000243 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
 11190                                  TestPrnError:				
 11191 00000245 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
 11192 00000246 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
 11193                                  pmessg:					
 11194 00000248 E98CFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
 11195                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11196                                  
 11197                                  prn_con:

 11200                                  ;prn_done:				
 11201                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11202                                  prn_done2:
 11203                                  		;clc
 11204                                  		; cf=0
 11205 0000024E C3                      		retn

 11208                                  ;************************************************************************
 11209                                  ;*									*
 11210                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
 11211                                  ;*									*
 11212                                  ;************************************************************************
 11213                                  
 11214                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
 11215 0000024F E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
 11216 00000252 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
 11217 00000254 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
 11218                                  		;jnz	short prn_done

 11221 00000259 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit

 11223                                  
 11224                                  ;************************************************************************
 11225                                  ;*									*
 11226                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
 11227                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
 11228                                  ;*									*
 11229                                  ;************************************************************************
 11230                                  
 11231                                  prnstat:				
 11232 0000025C B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
 11233                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
 11234                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
 11235                                  					; Return: AH = status
 11236                                  
 11237                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11238                                  
 11239                                  ;************************************************************************
 11240                                  ;*									*
 11241                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
 11242                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
 11243                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
 11244                                  ;*									*
 11245                                  ;************************************************************************
 11246                                  
 11247                                  prnop:
 11248                                  		; 20/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 11249                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 11250                                  		
 11251                                  		;mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
 11252                                  		;int	17h
 11253                                  
 11254 0000025E 1E                      		push	ds
 11255 0000025F FF36[2100]              		push	word [auxnum]
 11256 00000263 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx ; 0
 11257 00000265 8EDA                    		mov	ds, dx
 11258 00000267 5A                      		pop	dx
 11259 00000268 9C                      		pushf			; simulate int 17h
 11260 00000269 FA                      		cli
 11261                                  		;call	dword ptr ds:5ghghCh
 11262 0000026A FF1E5C00                		call	far [17h*4]	; 0:5Ch = INT 17h vector
 11263 0000026E 1F                      		pop	ds
 11264                                  
 11265                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
 11266                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
 11267                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
 11268                                  
 11269 0000026F 50                      		push	ax
 11270 00000270 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
 11271 00000273 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
 11272 00000276 58                      		pop	ax
 11273 00000277 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
 11274 00000279 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
 11275 0000027C 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
 11276                                  
 11277                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
 11278                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
 11279                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
 11280                                  
 11281                                  NextTest:				
 11282 0000027F F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
 11283                                  					; i/o error?
 11284 00000282 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
 11285                                  
 11286                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
 11287                                  
 11288 00000284 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
 11289                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
 11290 00000286 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
 11291 00000289 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
 11292 0000028B FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
 11293                                  ret1:					
 11294 0000028D C3                      		retn
 11295                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11296                                  
 11297                                  checknotready:				
 11298 0000028E B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
 11299 00000290 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
 11300 00000293 C3                      		retn
 11301                                  
 11302                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11303                                  
 11304                                  ;************************************************************************
 11305                                  ;*									*
 11306                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
 11307                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
 11308                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
 11309                                  ;*									*
 11310                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
 11311                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
 11312                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
 11313                                  ;*									*
 11314                                  ;************************************************************************
 11315                                  
 11316                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11317                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
 11318 00000294 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
 11319                                  prn_tilbloop:				
 11320 00000296 51                      		push	cx
 11321 00000297 53                      		push	bx
 11322 00000298 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
 11323 0000029A 8A1E[8004]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
 11324 0000029E D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
 11325                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
 11326 000002A0 8B8F[8104]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
 11327 000002A4 5B                      		pop	bx
 11328                                  prn_getstat:				
 11329 000002A5 E8B4FF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
 11330 000002A8 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
 11331 000002AA F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
 11332 000002AD E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
 11333 000002AF 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
 11334 000002B0 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
 11335 000002B2 26                      		es
 11336 000002B3 AC                      		lodsb
 11337                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
 11338                                  					; lodsb
 11339 000002B4 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 11340 000002B6 E8A5FF                  		call	prnop
 11341 000002B9 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
 11342 000002BB E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
 11343                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11344                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
 11345                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
 11346 000002BD C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
 11347                                  
 11348                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11349                                  
 11350                                  prn_bperr:				
 11351 000002BE 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
 11352                                  prn_berr:				
 11353 000002BF E915FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
 11354                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11355                                  
 11356                                  ; 15/10/2022

 11358                                  ;************************************************************************
 11359                                  ;*									*
 11360                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
 11361                                  ;*									*
 11362                                  ;************************************************************************
 11363                                  
 11364                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 11365                                  ; 11/01/2019
 11366                                  
 11367                                  ;********************************;*
 11368                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
 11369                                  ;********************************;*
 11370                                  
 11371                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
 11372                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
 11373                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
 11374                                  
 11375                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
 11376                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
 11377                                  ;;endstruc
 11378                                  
 11379                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
 11380                                  
 11381                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11382                                  
 11383                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11384                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
 11385 000002C2 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
 11386 000002C6 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11387                                  					; ioc_pc
 11388 000002CB 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
 11389                                  
 11390                                  prnfuncerr:				
 11391 000002CD E905FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 11392                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11393                                  
 11394                                  prnfunc_ok:				
 11395 000002D0 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11396 000002D4 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 11397 000002D8 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
 11398                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
 11399 000002DA 8A1E[8004]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
 11400 000002DE D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
 11401                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
 11402 000002E0 8B8F[8104]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
 11403 000002E4 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
 11404 000002E6 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
 11405 000002E8 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
 11406 000002EA 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
 11407 000002EC 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
 11408                                  prngetcount:				
 11409                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
 11410 000002EF 898F[8104]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
 11411 000002F3 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
 11412                                  					; return current retry count
 11413                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11414                                  		; cf=0
 11415                                  		;clc
 11416 000002F6 C3                      		retn
 11417                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11418                                  
 11419                                  ;************************************************************************
 11420                                  ;*									*

 11449                                  ;************************************************************************
 11450                                  ;*									*
 11451                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
 11452                                  ;*									*
 11453                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
 11454                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
 11455                                  ;*									*
 11456                                  ;************************************************************************
 11457                                  
 11458                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
 11459                                  
 11460                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
 11461                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
 11462                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
 11463                                  
 11464                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
 11465                                  
 11466                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
 11467                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
 11468                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
 11469                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
 11470                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
 11471                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
 11472                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
 11473                                  
 11474                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
 11475                                  
 11476                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
 11477                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
 11478                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
 11479                                  
 11480                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11481                                  
 11482                                  ;************************************************************************
 11483                                  ;*									*
 11484                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
 11485                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
 11486                                  ;*									*
 11487                                  ;************************************************************************
 11488                                  
 11489                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
 11490                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
 11491 00000312 E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
 11492 00000314 E88000                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
 11493 00000317 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 11494 00000319 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
 11495 0000031B 08C0                    		or	al, al
 11496 0000031D 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
 11497                                  aux1:					
 11498 0000031F E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
 11499                                  					; won't return if error
 11500                                  aux2:					
 11501 00000322 AA                      		stosb
 11502 00000323 E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
 11503                                  exvec2:					
 11504 00000325 F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
 11505                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
 11506 00000326 C3                      		retn
 11507                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11508                                  
 11509                                  ;************************************************************************
 11510                                  ;*									*
 11511                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
 11512                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
 11513                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
 11514                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
 11515                                  ;*									*
 11516                                  ;************************************************************************
 11517                                  
 11518                                  auxin:					
 11519 00000327 B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; auxfunc_receive
 11520 00000329 E83A00                  		call	auxop
 11521 0000032C F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
 11522                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
 11523                                  		;retn
 11524                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
 11525 0000032F 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
 11526                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11527                                  
 11528                                  arbad:					
 11529 00000331 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
 11530                                  		;xor	al, al
 11531                                  		;or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
 11532                                  		; 11/08/2023
 11533 00000332 B0B0                    		mov	al, 0B0h	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0334h
 11534 00000334 E9A0FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
 11535                                  
 11536                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11537                                  
 11538                                  ;************************************************************************
 11539                                  ;*									*
 11540                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
 11541                                  ;*									*
 11542                                  ;************************************************************************
 11543                                  
 11544                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h
 11545 00000337 E85D00                  		call	getbx
 11546 0000033A 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; have bx point	to auxbuf
 11547 0000033C 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
 11548 0000033E 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
 11549 00000340 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
 11550 00000343 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
 11551 00000346 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
 11552 00000348 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
 11553 0000034A 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
 11554 0000034C E8D8FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
 11555 0000034F 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
 11556                                  auxdrx:					
 11557 00000351 E99EFE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status
 11558                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11559                                  
 11560                                  auxbus:					
 11561 00000354 E970FE                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
 11562                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11563                                  
 11564                                  ;************************************************************************
 11565                                  ;*									*
 11566                                  ;*	aux_wrst - return aux port write status				*
 11567                                  ;*									*
 11568                                  ;************************************************************************
 11569                                  
 11570                                  aux_wrst:				; 2C7h:355h = 70h:28C5h

 11572 0000035A A820                    		test	al, 20h		; test data set	ready
 11573 0000035C 74F6                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
 11574 0000035E F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
 11575 00000361 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
 11576                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11577                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
 11578                                  		;clc
 11579 00000363 C3                      		retn
 11580                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11581                                  
 11582                                  ;************************************************************************
 11583                                  ;*									*
 11584                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
 11585                                  ;*									*
 11586                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
 11587                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
 11588                                  ;*									*
 11589                                  ;************************************************************************
 11590                                  
 11591                                  auxstat:				
 11592 00000364 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
 11593                                  
 11594                                  		; fall into auxop
 11595                                  
 11596                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11597                                  
 11598                                  ;************************************************************************
 11599                                  ;*									*
 11600                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
 11601                                  ;*									*
 11602                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
 11603                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
 11604                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
 11605                                  ;*									*
 11606                                  ;************************************************************************
 11607                                  
 11608                                  auxop:		; proc near
 11609                                  		; 20/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 11610                                  		;mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
 11611                                  		;			; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
 11612                                  		;			; get port number
 11613                                  		;
 11614                                  		;int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
 11615                                  		;			; DX = port number (0-3)
 11616                                  		;			; Return: AX = port status code
 11617                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 11618 00000366 1E                      		push	ds
 11619 00000367 FF36[2100]              		push	word [auxnum]
 11620 0000036B 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx ; 0
 11621 0000036D 8EDA                    		mov	ds, dx
 11622 0000036F 5A                      		pop	dx
 11623 00000370 9C                      		pushf			; simulate INT 14h
 11624 00000371 FA                      		cli
 11625                                  		;call	dword ptr ds:50h
 11626 00000372 FF1E5000                		call	far [14h*4]	; INT 14h vector (14h*4 = 50h)
 11627 00000376 1F                      		pop	ds
 11628 00000377 C3                      		retn
 11629                                  
 11630                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11631                                  
 11632                                  ;************************************************************************
 11633                                  ;*									*
 11634                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
 11635                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
 11636                                  ;*									*
 11637                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
 11638                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
 11639                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
 11640                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
 11641                                  ;*									*
 11642                                  ;************************************************************************
 11643                                  
 11644                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
 11645 00000378 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
 11646 0000037B C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
 11647                                  					; zero out buffer
 11648                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
 11649                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11650                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
 11651 0000037E C3                      		retn
 11652                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11653                                  
 11654                                  ;************************************************************************
 11655                                  ;*									*
 11656                                  ;*	aux_writ - write to aux device					*
 11657                                  ;*									*
 11658                                  ;************************************************************************
 11659                                  
 11660                                  aux_writ:				; 2C7h:374h = 70h:28E4h
 11661                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2	; write	to aux device (if cx > 0)
 11662 0000037F E3A4                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
 11663                                  aux_loop:				
 11664 00000381 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to be written
 11665                                  					; move di pointer to next character
 11666 00000384 47                      		inc	di
 11667 00000385 B401                    		mov	ah, 1		; auxfunc_send - indicates a write
 11668 00000387 E8DCFF                  		call	auxop		; send character over aux port
 11669 0000038A F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; check	for error
 11670 0000038D 7405                    		jz	short awok	; then no error
 11671 0000038F B00A                    		mov	al, 10		; else indicate	write fault
 11672 00000391 E943FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines
 11673                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11674                                  
 11675                                  awok:

 11677                                  					; still	more character to print
 11678                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
 11679                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11680                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
 11681 00000396 C3                      		retn
