 13506 000008E1 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 13507                                  		;mov	al, [si+9]	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 13508                                  		;mov	byte [si+9], 15 ; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 13509                                  		;			; NORMSETTLE
 13510                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13511 000008E5 B00F                    		mov	al, 15
 13512 000008E7 864409                  		xchg	al, [si+9]
 13513                                  		; 
 13514 000008EA 1F                      		pop	ds
 13515 000008EB A2[2A01]                		mov	[save_head_sttl], al
 13516 000008EE 58                      		pop	ax
 13517                                  rd_skip1_dpt:
 13518 000008EF 06                      		push	es
 13519 000008F0 1E                      		push	ds
 13520 000008F1 07                      		pop	es
 13521 000008F2 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 13522 000008F5 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 13523                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 13524                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 13525                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 13526 000008F7 07                      		pop	es
 13527 000008F8 9C                      		pushf
 13528 000008F9 803E[A905]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 13529 000008FE 750E                    		jnz	short rd_skip2_dpt
 13530 00000900 50                      		push	ax
 13531 00000901 A0[2A01]                		mov	al, [save_head_sttl]
 13532 00000904 1E                      		push	ds
 13533 00000905 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 13534 00000909 884409                  		mov	[si+9],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 13535 0000090C 1F                      		pop	ds
 13536 0000090D 58                      		pop	ax

 13669                                  ; miscellaneous odd jump routines.

 13672                                  ; if we have a system where we have virtual drives, we need

 13677                                  
 13678                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13679                                  checksingle:
 13680 00000977 50                      		push	ax
 13681 00000978 53                      		push	bx
 13682                                  		; 22/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 13683 00000979 268B5D3F                		mov	bx, [es:di+3Fh]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13684                                  		;mov	bx, [es:di+23h]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13685                                  
 13686                                  ; if hard drive, cannot change disk.
 13687                                  ; if current owner of physical drive, no need to change diskette.
 13688                                  
 13689 0000097D F6C321                  		test	bl, 21h		; fnon_removable|fi_own_physical
 13690 00000980 7573                    		jnz	short singleret
 13691 00000982 F6C310                  		test	bl, 10h		; fi_am_mult
 13692                                  					; is there a drive sharing this	physical drive?
 13693 00000985 746E                    		jz	short singleret
 13694                                  
 13695                                  ; look for the previous owner of this physical drive
 13696                                  ; and reset its ownership flag.
 13697                                  
 13698 00000987 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13699                                  					; get physical drive number
 13700 0000098B 06                      		push	es		; preserve pointer to current bds
 13701 0000098C 57                      		push	di
 13702 0000098D C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; get first bds
 13703                                  scan_list:

 13705 00000995 7553                    		jnz	short scan_skip	; Not our drive. Try next bds.
 13706 00000997 B320                    		mov	bl, 20h	; ' '   ; fi_own_physical ; test ownership flag
 13707                                  		; 22/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 13708 00000999 26845D3F                		test	[es:di+3Fh], bl	; [es:di+BDS.flags]

 13718                                  ; we examine the fsetowner flag. if it is set, then we are using the code in

 13720                                  ; in this case.

 13737                                  
 13738                                  ; to support "backward" compatibility with ibm's "single drive status byte"
 13739                                  ; we now check to see if we are in a single drive system and the application

 13813                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13814                                  ;	disk i/o handler
 13815                                  ;
 13816                                  ;	al = drive number (0-6)
 13817                                  ;	ah = media descriptor
 13818                                  ;	cx = sector count
 13819                                  ;	dx = first sector (low)
 13820                                  ;	[start_sec_h] = first sector (high)  32 bit calculation.
 13821                                  ;	ds = cs
 13822                                  ;	es:di = transfer address
 13823                                  ;	[rflag]=operation (2=read, 3=write)
 13824                                  ;	[verify]=1 for verify after write
 13825                                  ;
 13826                                  ;	if successful carry flag = 0
 13827                                  ;	  else cf=1 and al contains error code
 13828                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13829                                  
 13830                                  		; 12/12/2023

 13853                                  ; see if the media is formatted or not by checking the flags field in

 13862                                  		mov	[spsav], sp	; save sp

 14672                                  dskerr0:
 14673 00000D43 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 14674                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14675 00000D45 26F6453F01              		test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 1

 14677                                  					; fnon_removable
 14678 00000D4A 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 14679 00000D4C 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 14680 00000D4F 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 14681                                  skip_timeout_chk:
 14682 00000D51 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 14683 00000D54 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 14684 00000D56 C706[A504]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 14685                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 14686                                  dskerr1:

 14688                                  		;jmp	retry

 14695                                  					; for write fault error.

 14706 00000D68 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 14707                                  					; force a media check through rom
 14708 00000D6D 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 14709 00000D71 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer

 14711                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 14712

 14717                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14718                                  
 14719                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 14720                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.

 14722                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14723                                  normspeed:
 14724 00000D78 803E[A905]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0

 14729 00000D84 C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 14730 00000D88 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 14731 00000D8C 58                      		pop	ax
 14732 00000D8D 07                      		pop	es
 14733 00000D8E E80B00                  		call	fastspeed
 14734                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14735                                  		;push	es
 14736                                  		;les	si, [dpt]
 14737                                  		;mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 14738                                  		;			; 1 is fast settle value
 14739                                  		;pop	es

 14741 00000D92 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 14742 00000D96 C6440901                		mov	byte [si+9], 1

 14744                                  
 14745 00000D9B C3                      		retn

 14747                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14748                                  
 14749                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 14750                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 14751                                  
 14752                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 14753                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0DDDh)
 14754                                  fastspeed:
 14755                                  		;;test	byte [es:di+3Bh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 14756                                  		;test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 14757                                  		;			; ftoobig
 14758                                  		;jnz	short notready

 14762 00000DA3 8C06[A804]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 14763 00000DA7 07                      		pop	es

 14772                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14773                                  
 14774                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 14775                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 14776                                  
 14777                                  maperror:
 14778 00000DA9 51                      		push	cx
 14779 00000DAA 06                      		push	es
 14780 00000DAB 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 14781 00000DAC 07                      		pop	es
 14782 00000DAD 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 14783 00000DAF A2[4601]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 14784                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14785 00000DB2 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11 ; PCDOS 7.1 ; 02/09/2023
 14786                                  		;mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 14787                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 14788 00000DB5 BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 14789 00000DB8 F2AE                    		repne scasb
 14790                                  
 14791                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14792                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14793 00000DBA 8A450A                  		mov	al, [di+10] ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 14794                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14795                                  		;mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 14796                                  					; get translation
 14797                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary !

 14800 00000DBE 59                      		pop	cx
 14801 00000DBF F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 14802 00000DC0 C3                      		retn
 14803                                  
 14804                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14805                                  
 14806                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 14807                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 14808                                  
 14809                                  set_tim:
 14810 00000DC1 50                      		push	ax
 14811 00000DC2 E86CF7                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 14812                                  
 14813                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 14814                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 14815                                  
 14816                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 14817 00000DC5 263B5579                		cmp	dx, [es:di+79h]	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 14818                                  		;cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 14819 00000DC9 7506                    		jne	short setaccess
 14820                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14821 00000DCB 263B4D7B                		cmp	cx, [es:di+7Bh]	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 14822                                  		;cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 14823                                  		;jz	short done_set
 14824                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14825 00000DCF 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 14826                                  setaccess:
 14827 00000DD1 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 14828                                  		
 14829                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 14830 00000DD6 26895579                		mov	[es:di+79h], dx
 14831 00000DDA 26894D7B                		mov	[es:di+7Bh], cx
 14832                                  		;mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 14833                                  		;mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 14834                                  done_set:
 14835 00000DDE F8                      		clc
 14836                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 14837 00000DDF 58                      		pop	ax
 14838 00000DE0 C3                      		retn
 14839                                  
 14840                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14841                                  
 14842                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 14843                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 14844                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 14845                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 14846                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 14847                                  
 14848                                  again:
 14849 00000DE1 E85705                  		call	ResetDisk
 14850 00000DE4 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14851 00000DE7 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 14852                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 14853 00000DE9 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 14854 00000DEA C3                      		retn
 14855                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14856                                  
 14857                                  dont_dec_retry_count:
 14858 00000DEB 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 14859 00000DED C3                      		retn

 14872                                  
 14873                                  get_phy_drv_num:
 14874 00000DEF E8B2F7                  		call	SetDrive	; get physical drive number
 14875                                  					; INPUT: al = logical drive number (BDS.drivelet)
 14876                                  					; OUTPUT: physical drive number (BDS.drivenum)
 14877 00000DF2 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14878 00000DF6 C3                      		retn

 14880                                  ; =============== S U B R O U T I N E =======================================
 14881                                  
 14882                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14883                                  ioctl_output:
 14884 00000DF7 E8F5FF                  		call	get_phy_drv_num
 14885 00000DFA 2E8816[EE0D]            		mov	[cs:ioctl_drvnum], dl
 14886 00000DFF B441                    		mov	ah, 41h
 14887 00000E01 BBAA55                  		mov	bx, 55AAh
 14888 00000E04 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - Check for INT 13h Extensions
 14889                                  					; BX = 55AAh, DL = drive number
 14890                                  					; Return: CF set if not supported
 14891                                  					; AH = extensions version
 14892                                  					; BX = AA55h
 14893                                  					; CX = Interface support bit map
 14894 00000E06 7235                    		jc	short int13h_exts_err
 14895                                  ioctl_input_1:
 14896 00000E08 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
 14897 00000E0C 26C47D0E                		les	di, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 14898 00000E10 723E                    		jc	short ioctl_input_2
 14899 00000E12 B80046                  		mov	ax, 4600h	; Eject removable media
 14900 00000E15 263805                  		cmp	[es:di], al	; al = 0 ; disk ioctl function = 0
 14901 00000E18 7417                    		je	short ioctl_output_1
 14902 00000E1A 26803D01                		cmp	byte [es:di], 1 ; al = 1 ; disk ioctl function = 1
 14903 00000E1E 751B                    		jne	short ioctl_output_2
 14904 00000E20 B80145                  		mov	ax, 4501h	; Lock/unlock media
 14905                                  					; (al, 0 = lock, 1 = unlock)
 14906 00000E23 26807D0100              		cmp	byte [es:di+1], 0 ; unlock (reverse of INT 13h ah=45h)
 14907 00000E28 7407                    		jz	short ioctl_output_1
 14908 00000E2A 26384501                		cmp	[es:di+1], al	; lock (reverse of INT 13h ah=45h)
 14909 00000E2E 750B                    		jne	short ioctl_output_2
 14910 00000E30 48                      		dec	ax
 14911                                  ioctl_output_1:
 14912 00000E31 2E8A16[EE0D]            		mov	dl, [cs:ioctl_drvnum]
 14913 00000E36 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - IBM/MS Extension - LOCK/UNLOCK DRIVE (DL - drive, [SI - disk address packet)
 14914 00000E38 7203                    		jc	short int13h_exts_err
 14915                                  ioctl_lock_err:
 14916                                  		; cf=0
 14917                                  ioctl_output_ret:
 14918                                  		;clc
 14919 00000E3A C3                      		retn
 14920                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14921                                  
 14922                                  ioctl_output_2:
 14923 00000E3B B401                    		mov	ah, 1
 14924                                  int13h_exts_err:
 14925 00000E3D 80FCB0                  		cmp	ah, 0B0h	; volume not locked in drive
 14926 00000E40 74F8                    		je	short ioctl_lock_err
 14927 00000E42 80FCB4                  		cmp	ah, 0B4h	; lock count exceeded
 14928 00000E45 74F3                    		je	short ioctl_lock_err
 14929 00000E47 E9DAF7                  		jmp	err_exitj
 14930                                  
 14931                                  ; =============== S U B R O U T I N E =======================================
 14932                                  
 14933                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14934                                  ioctl_input:
 14935 00000E4A E8A2FF                  		call	get_phy_drv_num
 14936 00000E4D F9                      		stc
 14937 00000E4E EBB8                    		jmp	short ioctl_input_1
 14938                                  ioctl_input_2:
 14939 00000E50 26803D06                		cmp	byte [es:di], 6	; disk ioctl function = 6
 14940 00000E54 75E5                    		jne	short ioctl_output_2
 14941 00000E56 B80245                  		mov	ax, 4502h	; get lock status
 14942 00000E59 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - IBM/MS Extension - LOCK/UNLOCK DRIVE (DL - drive, [SI - disk address packet)
 14943 00000E5B 72E0                    		jc	short int13h_exts_err
 14944 00000E5D BB0C00                  		mov	bx, 0Ch		; bit 1 lock bit
 14945 00000E60 3C00                    		cmp	al, 0		; not locked
 14946 00000E62 7402                    		jz	short ioctl_input_3
 14947 00000E64 B30E                    		mov	bl, 0Eh
 14948                                  ioctl_input_3:
 14949 00000E66 53                      		push	bx
 14950 00000E67 B404                    		mov	ah, 4
 14951 00000E69 B90101                  		mov	cx, 101h
 14952 00000E6C B601                    		mov	dh, 1
 14953 00000E6E CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - VERIFY SECTORS
 14954                                  					; AL = number of sectors to verify, CH = track, CL = sector
 14955                                  					; DH = head, DL = drive
 14956                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH = status
 14957                                  					; AL = number of sectors verified
 14958 00000E70 5B                      		pop	bx
 14959 00000E71 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; no media in drive (IBM/MS INT 13 extensions)
 14960 00000E74 740B                    		je	short ioctl_input_5
 14961 00000E76 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout (not ready)
 14962 00000E79 7406                    		je	short ioctl_input_5
 14963                                  ioctl_input_4:
 14964 00000E7B 26895D01                		mov	[es:di+1], bx
 14965 00000E7F EBB9                    		jmp	short ioctl_lock_err
 14966                                  ioctl_input_5:
 14967 00000E81 81CB0108                		or	bx, 801h	; bit 0 error bit (1 = error, 31h or 80h)
 14968                                  					; bit 11 (not ready -removable media error- bit)
 14969                                  					; if bit 11 = 0, another error (except 31h and 80h)
 14970 00000E85 EBF4                    		jmp	short ioctl_input_4

 15493 0000104C 8D7728                  		lea	si, [bx+28h]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SECTORTABLE]
 15494                                  					; offset 31+9 (A_BPB.size+9)
 15495                                  sdp_4:
 15496                                  		;;;
 15497                                  
 15498                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15499 0000104F 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 15500                                  		;mov	es, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 15501                                  					; Trash	our bds	pointer
 15502                                  StoreSectorInfo:
 15503 00001054 47                      		inc	di
 15504 00001055 47                      		inc	di		; Skip over cylinder and head
 15505 00001056 AD                      		lodsw			; Get sector id
 15506 00001057 AA                      		stosb			; Copy it
 15507 00001058 AD                      		lodsw			; Get sector size
 15508                                  		
 15509                                  		; 24/12/2023
 15510                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15511                                  		;call	SectSizeToSectIndex
 15512                                  		; 18/04/2024
 15513                                  		;cmp	ah, 3 ; 02/09/2023
 15514 00001059 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024)
 15515                                  					; examine upper	byte only
 15516 0000105C 7704                    		ja	short OneK
 15517 0000105E 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; value	in AH is the index!
 15518 00001060 EB02                    		jmp	short sdp_s
 15519                                  OneK:
 15520 00001062 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 1024 bytes per sector
 15521                                  sdp_s:
 15522 00001064 AA                      		stosb			; Store	sector SIZE index
 15523 00001065 E2ED                    		loop	StoreSectorInfo
 15524                                  SectorInfoSaved:
 15525 00001067 F8                      		clc
 15526 00001068 C3                      		retn
 15527                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15528                                  
 15529                                  TooManyPerTrack:
 15530 00001069 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch
 15531 0000106B F9                      		stc
 15532 0000106C C3                      		retn
 15533                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15534                                  
 15535                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15536                                  
 15537                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15538                                  ; FormatTrack:
 15539                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 15540                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 15541                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 15542                                  ;
 15543                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 15544                                  ;
 15545                                  ; output:
 15546                                  ;	for status call:
 15547                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 15548                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 15549                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 15550                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 15551                                  ;		3 - no media present
 15552                                  ;	carry cleared.
 15553                                  ;
 15554                                  ;	for format track:
 15555                                  ;		carry set if error
 15556                                  ;
 15557                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15558                                  
 15559                                  ; 16/03/2019
 15560                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 15561                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:10B7h)
 15562                                  
 15563                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15564                                  FormatTrack:
 15565 0000106D C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 15566 00001071 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET
 15567 00001074 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 15568                                  					; STATUS_FOR_FORMAT
 15569 00001077 740E                    		jz	short DoFormatTrack
 15570 00001079 1E                      		push	ds
 15571                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15572 0000107A 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 15573                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 15574 0000107F E82502                  		call	SetMediaForFormat ; Also moves current Dpt to TempDpt
 15575 00001082 1F                      		pop	ds
 15576 00001083 8807                    		mov	[bx], al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 15577 00001085 F8                      		clc
 15578 00001086 C3                      		retn
 15579                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15580                                  
 15581                                  DoFormatTrack:
 15582                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 15583 00001087 26807D3E05              		cmp	byte [es:di+3Eh], 5				
 15584                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+34], 5 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15585                                  					; DEV_HARDDISK
 15586 0000108C 7508                    		jnz	short DoFormatDiskette
 15587                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15588 0000108E 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 15589                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 15590                                  					; Point	to Bios_Data (at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h)
 15591 00001093 E99D00                  		jmp	VerifyTrack
 15592                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15593                                  
 15594                                  DoFormatDiskette:
 15595 00001096 8B4F01                  		mov	cx, [bx+1]
 15596 00001099 8B5703                  		mov	dx, [bx+3]
 15597 0000109C F60702                  		test	byte [bx], 2
 15598                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15599 0000109F 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 15600                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 15601                                  					; Setup	ds-> Bios_Data for verify
 15602 000010A4 7403                    		jz	short DoFormatDiskette_1
 15603 000010A6 E9E500                  		jmp	VerifyTrack_Err
 15604                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15605                                  
 15606                                  DoFormatDiskette_1:
 15607 000010A9 E8FB01                  		call	SetMediaForFormat ; Also moves current Dpt to TempDpt
 15608 000010AC 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1		;  ROM support for sec/trk,# trks comb?
 15609 000010AE 7406                    		jz	short NeedToSetDasd ; Old rom
 15610 000010B0 3C03                    		cmp	al, 3		; Time out error?
 15611 000010B2 7507                    		jnz	short NoSetDasd	; No,fine. (at this point, don't care
 15612                                  					; about	the illegal combination)
 15613 000010B4 EB68                    		jmp	short FormatFailed
 15614                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15615                                  
 15616                                  NeedToSetDasd:
 15617 000010B6 52                      		push	dx
 15618 000010B7 E89001                  		call	SetDasd		; INT 13h, AH=17h
 15619 000010BA 5A                      		pop	dx
 15620                                  NoSetDasd:
 15621 000010BB E8B9F8                  		call	checksingle	; Do any needed	diskette swapping
 15622 000010BE 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx		; Get track from packet
 15623 000010C0 A3[3901]                		mov	[trknum], ax
 15624 000010C3 880E[3801]              		mov	[hdnum], cl	; Store	head from packet
 15625 000010C7 88CC                    		mov	ah, cl
 15626 000010C9 BB[AC04]                		mov	bx, tracktable
 15627 000010CC 8B0E[AA04]              		mov	cx, [sectorspertrack]
 15628                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 15629 000010D0 E307                    		jcxz	set_fmt_retry_count
 15630                                  StoreCylinderHead:
 15631 000010D2 8907                    		mov	[bx], ax	; Store	into TrackTable
 15632 000010D4 83C304                  		add	bx, 4		; Skip to next sector field
 15633 000010D7 E2F9                    		loop	StoreCylinderHead
 15634                                  set_fmt_retry_count:	; 24/12/2023
 15635                                  		;mov	cx, 5		; MAXERR - Set up retry	count
 15636                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15637 000010D9 B105                    		mov	cl, 5
 15638                                  FormatRetry:
 15639 000010DB 51                      		push	cx
 15640 000010DC BB[AC04]                		mov	bx, tracktable
 15641 000010DF A0[AA04]                		mov	al, [sectorspertrack]
 15642 000010E2 B405                    		mov	ah, 5		; romformat
 15643 000010E4 8C1E[A804]              		mov	[xfer_seg], ds
 15644 000010E8 E86602                  		call	ToRom
 15645 000010EB 59                      		pop	cx
 15646 000010EC 7216                    		jb	short FormatError
 15647 000010EE 51                      		push	cx		; Now verify the sectors just formatted.
 15648                                  					; NOTE:	because	of bug in some BIOSes we have to
 15649                                  					;	set ES:BX to 00:00
 15650 000010EF 53                      		push	bx
 15651 000010F0 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
 15652 000010F2 891E[A804]              		mov	[xfer_seg], bx
 15653 000010F6 A0[AA04]                		mov	al, [sectorspertrack]
 15654 000010F9 B404                    		mov	ah, 4		; romverify
 15655 000010FB B101                    		mov	cl, 1
 15656 000010FD E85102                  		call	ToRom
 15657 00001100 5B                      		pop	bx
 15658 00001101 59                      		pop	cx
 15659 00001102 7329                    		jnb	short FormatOk
 15660                                  FormatError:
 15661 00001104 E83402                  		call	ResetDisk
 15662 00001107 C606[AA05]01            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 1
 15663 0000110C 50                      		push	ax
 15664 0000110D 51                      		push	cx
 15665 0000110E 52                      		push	dx
 15666 0000110F E89501                  		call	SetMediaForFormat
 15667 00001112 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1
 15668 00001114 7503                    		jnz	short WhileErr
 15669 00001116 E83101                  		call	SetDasd
 15670                                  WhileErr:
 15671 00001119 5A                      		pop	dx
 15672 0000111A 59                      		pop	cx
 15673 0000111B 58                      		pop	ax
 15674 0000111C E2BD                    		loop	FormatRetry
 15675                                  FormatFailed:
 15676 0000111E C606[AA05]01            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 1
 15677                                  					; Set the format error flag
 15678 00001123 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6		; DSK_CHANGELINE_ERR - convert change line
 15679 00001126 7502                    		jnz	short DoMapIt	; Error	to time	out error
 15680 00001128 B480                    		mov	ah, 80h		; DSK_TIMEOUT_ERR
 15681                                  DoMapIt:
 15682 0000112A E97CFC                  		jmp	maperror
 15683                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15684                                  
 15685                                  FormatOk:
 15686 0000112D C606[AA05]00            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 0 ; reset the format error flag
 15687 00001132 C3                      		retn
 15688                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15689                                  
 15690                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15691                                  
 15692                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15693                                  ;
 15694                                  ; VerifyTrack:
 15695                                  ;
 15696                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 15697                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15698                                  
 15699                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 15700                                  VerifyTrack:
 15701 00001133 1E                      		push	ds
 15702 00001134 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX points to request header.
 15703 00001138 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 15704                                  
 15705                                  		; Come here with DS:[BX] -> packet, ES:[DI] -> bds
 15706                                  
 15707 0000113B 8B4F03                  		mov	cx, [bx+3]	; [bx+A_VERIFYPACKET.VP_CYLINDER]
 15708 0000113E 8B4701                  		mov	ax, [bx+1]	; [bx+A_VERIFYPACKET.VP_HEAD]
 15709 00001141 8B5705                  		mov	dx, [bx+5]	; [bx+A_FORMATPACKET.FP_TRACKCOUNT]
 15710 00001144 8A1F                    		mov	bl, [bx]	; [bx+A_FORMATPACKET.FP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 15711                                  					; Get option flag word
 15712 00001146 1F                      		pop	ds
 15713 00001147 C606[2001]04            		mov	byte [rflag], 4	; romverify
 15714 0000114C 890E[3301]              		mov	[curtrk], cx
 15715 00001150 A2[3201]                		mov	[curhd], al	; ASSUME heads < 256
 15716 00001153 8B0E[AA04]              		mov	cx, [sectorspertrack]
 15717                                  
 15718                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 15719                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 15720                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 15721                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 15722                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 15723                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 15724                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 15725                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 15726                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay
 15727                                  		; we initialise cx to the total sectors. use ax as a temporary
 15728                                  		; register.
 15729                                  
 15730                                  					; Special function requested?	
 15731 00001157 F6C302                  		test	bl, 2		; DO_FAST_FORMAT
 15732 0000115A 7421                    		jz	short NormVerifyTrack
 15733 0000115C 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx		; Get ax = number of trks to verify
 15734 0000115E 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 15735 00001160 752C                    		jnz	short VerifyTrack_Err ; #tracks > 255
 15736 00001162 F6E1                    		mul	cl
 15737 00001164 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 15738 00001166 7526                    		jnz	short VerifyTrack_Err ; #sectors > 255	
 15739 00001168 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
 15740                                  		; 24/12/2023
 15741 0000116A 26F6453F01              		test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 1 ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 15742                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15743                                  		;test	byte [es:di+35], 1
 15744                                  		;;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15745                                  					; fnon_removable
 15746 0000116F 740C                    		jz	short NormVerifyTrack
 15747                                  					; Multitrack operation = on?
 15748                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15749                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15750 00001171 F606[A004]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 15751                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 15752                                  		;;test	ds:multrk_flag,	80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 15753 00001176 7405                    		jz	short NormVerifyTrack
 15754 00001178 C606[A704]01            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1
 15755                                  NormVerifyTrack:
 15756 0000117D 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax		; 1st sector
 15757 0000117F 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
 15758 00001181 891E[A804]              		mov	[xfer_seg], bx	; Use 0:0 as the transfer address for verify
 15759 00001185 E83F00                  		call	TrackIo
 15760 00001188 C606[A704]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0
 15761 0000118D C3                      		retn
 15762                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15763                                  
 15764                                  VerifyTrack_Err:
 15765 0000118E B401                    		mov	ah, 1
 15766 00001190 E916FC                  		jmp	maperror
 15767                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15768                                  
 15769                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15770                                  
 15771                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15772                                  ;
 15773                                  ; ReadTrack:
 15774                                  ;
 15775                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 15776                                  ;
 15777                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15778                                  
 15779                                  ReadTrack:
 15780 00001193 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 15781 00001198 EB05                    		jmp	short ReadWriteTrack
 15782                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15783                                  
 15784                                  WriteTrack:
 15785                                  
 15786                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15787                                  ;
 15788                                  ; WriteTrack:
 15789                                  ;
 15790                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 15791                                  ;
 15792                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15793                                  				
 15794 0000119A C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 15795                                  
 15796                                  		; Fall into ReadWriteTrack
 15797                                  
 15798                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15799                                  ;
 15800                                  ; readWriteTrack:
 15801                                  ;
 15802                                  ; input:
 15803                                  ;    ES:di points to bds for drive
 15804                                  ;    rFlag - 2 for read,3 for write
 15805                                  ;
 15806                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15807                                  
 15808                                  ReadWriteTrack:	
 15809                                  		; save bds pointer segment so we can use it to access
 15810                                  		; our packet. Notice that this is not the standard register
 15811                                  		; assignment for accessing packets
 15812                                  		
 15813                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15814 0000119F 06                      		push	es
 15815 000011A0 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	-> to request header
 15816 000011A4 26C45F13                		les	bx, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 15817 000011A8 268B4703                		mov	ax, [es:bx+3]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_CYLINDER]
 15818 000011AC A3[3301]                		mov	[curtrk], ax
 15819 000011AF 268B4701                		mov	ax, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_HEAD]
 15820 000011B3 A2[3201]                		mov	[curhd], al	; Assume heads < 256!!!
 15821 000011B6 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_FIRSTSECTOR]
 15822 000011BA 268B4F07                		mov	cx, [es:bx+7]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_SECTORSTOREADWRITE]
 15823 000011BE 26C45F09                		les	bx, [es:bx+9]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_TRANSFERADDRESS]
 15824                                  					; Get transfer address
 15825                                  
 15826                                  		; we just trashed our packet address, but we no longer care
 15827                                  
 15828 000011C2 8C06[A804]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es	; Pass transfer	segment
 15829 000011C6 07                      		pop	es
 15830                                  
 15831                                  		; Fall into TrackIo
 15832                                  
 15833                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15834                                  
 15835                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 15836                                  
 15837                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15838                                  ;
 15839                                  ; TrackIo:
 15840                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 15841                                  ;
 15842                                  ;   input:
 15843                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 15844                                  ;		  3 = write
 15845                                  ;		  4 = verify
 15846                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 15847                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 15848                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 15849                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 15850                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 15851                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 15852                                  ;
 15853                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15854                                  
 15855                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 15856                                  
 15857                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0		
 15858                                  
 15859                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15860                                  TrackIo:
 15861                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 15862 000011C7 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 15863 000011CB E8A9F7                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 15864 000011CE 803E[A905]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 15865                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 15866 000011D3 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 15867 000011D5 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 15868 000011D6 51                      		push	cx
 15869 000011D7 E8A0F9                  		call	iosetup
 15870 000011DA 59                      		pop	cx
 15871 000011DB 58                      		pop	ax
 15872                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 15873 000011DC BE[AC04]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 15874                                  		; 24/12/2023
 15875                                  		;add	ax, ax		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 15876                                  		;add	ax, ax
 15877 000011DF D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 15878 000011E1 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 15879 000011E3 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 15880                                  
 15881                                  		; WE WANT:
 15882                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 15883                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 15884                                  		
 15885 000011E5 BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 15886                                  
 15887                                  		; 24/12/2023
 15888 000011E8 26F6453F08              		test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 8 ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 15889                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15890                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 15891                                  		;;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15892                                  					; good_tracklayout
 15893 000011ED 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 15894                                  		
 15895 000011EF 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 15896                                  ionextsector:
 15897 000011F1 51                      		push	cx
 15898 000011F2 52                      		push	dx
 15899 000011F3 46                      		inc	si
 15900 000011F4 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 15901                                  					; the track table
 15902 000011F5 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 15903 000011F6 A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 15904                                  
 15905                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 15906                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 15907                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 15908                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 15909                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 15910                                  		
 15911                                  		; 24/12/2023
 15912 000011F9 26F6453F01              		test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 1 ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 15913                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15914                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 15915                                  		;;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15916                                  					; fnon_removable ; Fixed disk?
 15917 000011FE 7414                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No
 15918                                  
 15919                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15920 00001200 F606[A004]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 15921                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 15922                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 15923 00001205 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 15924 00001207 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 15925 0000120B 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 15926 0000120D E823FA                  		call	Disk
 15927 00001210 5A                      		pop	dx
 15928 00001211 59                      		pop	cx
 15929 00001212 F8                      		clc
 15930 00001213 C3                      		retn
 15931                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15932                                  
 15933                                  IoRemovable:
 15934 00001214 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 15935                                  					; table	and save it
 15936 00001215 50                      		push	ax
 15937 00001216 56                      		push	si
 15938 00001217 1E                      		push	ds		; Save Bios_Data
 15939 00001218 50                      		push	ax
 15940 00001219 8A26[2C01]              		mov	ah, [eot]	; Preserve whatever might be in	ah
 15941                                  					; Fetch	EOT while ds-> Bios_Data

 15977                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================

 15979                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15980                                  ;
 15981                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 15982                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 15983                                  ; are permissible.
 15984                                  ;
 15985                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 15986                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 15987                                  ; All other registers preserved

 16105 0000129C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 16106                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 16107                                  DasdHasBeenSet:

 16112                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16113                                  
 16114                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16115                                  
 16116                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16117                                  ;
 16118                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 16119                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 16120                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 16121                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 16122                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 16123                                  ;
 16124                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 16125                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 16126                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 16127                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 16128                                  ;
 16129                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 16130                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 16131                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 16132                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 16133                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 16134                                  ;
 16135                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16136                                  
 16137                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16138                                  
 16139                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16140                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 16141 000012A7 51                      		push	cx
 16142 000012A8 52                      		push	dx
 16143                                  
 16144                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 16145                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 16146                                  
 16147 000012A9 803E[AA05]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 16148 000012AE 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 16149 000012B0 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 16150 000012B2 803E[A905]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 16151 000012B7 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 16152 000012B9 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 16153                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16154                                  
 16155                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:
 16156 000012BB 06                      		push	es
 16157 000012BC 56                      		push	si
 16158                                  
 16159                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16160                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 16161 000012BD 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 16162 000012BF 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 16163                                  
 16164 000012C1 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 16165                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 16166                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 16167 000012C6 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 16168 000012CA 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 16169                                  
 16170                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 16171                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 16172                                  
 16173 000012CE 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 16174 000012D3 5E                      		pop	si
 16175 000012D4 07                      		pop	es
 16176                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:
 16177                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16178 000012D5 268B4D41                		mov	cx, [es:di+41h]	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 16179                                  		;mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 16180 000012D9 49                      		dec	cx
 16181 000012DA 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 16182 000012DD D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 16183 000012DF D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 16184 000012E1 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 16185 000012E3 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 16186 000012E7 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 16187 000012EB 06                      		push	es
 16188 000012EC 1E                      		push	ds
 16189 000012ED 56                      		push	si
 16190 000012EE 57                      		push	di
 16191 000012EF B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 16192 000012F1 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 16193                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 16194 000012F3 7231                    		jc	short FormaStatErr
 16195 000012F5 803E[AA05]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 16196 000012FA 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 16197 000012FC 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 16198                                  
 16199                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16200                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 16201 000012FD 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 16202 000012FF 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 16203 00001301 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 16204                                  
 16205 00001302 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 16206                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 16207                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 16208 00001307 8936[AB05]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 16209 0000130B 8C06[AD05]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 16210                                  
 16211                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16212                                  		;;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 16213                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0
 16214                                  		;mov	es, si
 16215 0000130F 07                      		pop	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 16216                                  
 16217                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di
 16218 00001310 26893E7800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], di
 16219                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom
 16220 00001315 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]
 16221 0000131A C606[A905]01            		mov	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 16222                                  skip_disk_base_setting:
 16223 0000131F 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Legal	combination + rom support code
 16224                                  		;mov	ds:had_format_error, al	; Reset	the flag
 16225 00001321 A2[AA05]                		mov	[had_format_error], al

 16234                                  					; Illegal combination =	0Ch
 16235 0000132B 7406                    		jz	short FormatStatIllegalComb
 16236 0000132D 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; DSK_TIMEOUT_ERR

 16275                                  
 16276                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16277                                  
 16278                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16279                                  ;
 16280                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 16281                                  ;
 16282                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 16283                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 16284                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 16285                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 16286                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 16287                                  ;
 16288                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16289                                  
 16290                                  ResetDisk:
 16291 0000133B 50                      		push	ax
 16292                                  
 16293                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16294 0000133C B80100                  		mov	ax, 1 ; PCDOS 7.1
 16295 0000133F 3806[A905]              		cmp	[media_set_for_format], al ; 1
 16296                                  		;cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 16297                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 16298 00001343 7503                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 16299                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 16300                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 16301 00001345 A2[AA05]                		mov	[had_format_error], al ; 1
 16302                                  ResetDisk_cont:
 16303                                  		; 02/09/2023 (ah=0)
 16304                                  		;xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 16305 00001348 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 16306                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 16307 0000134A C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 16308                                  					; Zap up the speed
 16309 0000134F 58                      		pop	ax
 16310 00001350 C3                      		retn
 16311                                  
 16312                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16313                                  
 16314                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16315                                  
 16316                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16317                                  ;
 16318                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 16319                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 16320                                  ;
 16321                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 16322                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 16323                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 16324                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 16325                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 16326                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 16327                                  ;
 16328                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 16329                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 16330                                  ;
 16331                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16332                                  
 16333                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16334                                  
 16335                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16336                                  ToRom:
 16337 00001351 53                      		push	bx
 16338 00001352 56                      		push	si
 16339                                  
 16340                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 16341                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 16342                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 16343                                  
 16344 00001353 F606[A905]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 16345 00001358 7534                    		jnz	short GotValidDpt
 16346 0000135A 50                      		push	ax
 16347 0000135B 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 16348                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16349 0000135C 26807D3E02              		cmp	byte [es:di+3Eh], 2
 16350                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 16351                                  					; ffSmall ; is it a 3.5" drive?
 16352                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16353                                  		;pushf	; not necessary	; (Save	the cmp	result)
 16354 00001361 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 16355                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; Get pointer to disk base table
 16356 00001365 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 16357                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt, si
 16358                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt+2, es ;	 Save pointer to table
 16359 0000136A 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 16360 0000136E 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 16361                                  		
 16362 00001372 A0[3701]                		mov	al, [formt_eot]
 16363 00001375 26884404                		mov	[es:si+4], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 16364 00001379 A0[3B01]                		mov	al, [gap_patch]
 16365 0000137C 26884407                		mov	[es:si+7], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_FORMT_GAP]
 16366                                  					; Important for	format
 16367 00001380 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 16368                                  					; Assume we are	doing a	seek operation
 16369                                  					; Setup	motor start correctly for 3.5" drives
 16370                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16371                                  		;popf			; Get result of	earlier	cmp
 16372 00001385 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK
 16373 00001387 26C6440A04              		mov	byte [es:si+0Ah], 4 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 16374                                  MotorStrtOK:
 16375 0000138C 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 16376 0000138D 58                      		pop	ax
 16377                                  GotValidDpt:
 16378 0000138E 8B16[3901]              		mov	dx, [trknum]	; Set track number
 16379 00001392 88D5                    		mov	ch, dl		; Set low 8 bits in ch
 16380 00001394 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; Set drive number
 16381 00001398 8A36[3801]              		mov	dh, [hdnum]	; Set head number
 16382 0000139C 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 16383 0000139D 8E06[A804]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 16384 000013A1 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 16385 000013A3 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 16386 000013A4 5E                      		pop	si
 16387 000013A5 5B                      		pop	bx
 16388 000013A6 C3                      		retn
 16389                                  
 16390                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16391                                  
 16392                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 16393                                  ; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 16394                                  
 16395                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 16396                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1404h
 16397                                  
 16398                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16399                                  ;
 16400                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 16401                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 16402                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 16403                                  ;
 16404                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16405                                  
 16406                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16407                                  
 16408                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16409                                  ioctl_getown:
 16410 000013A7 E8FAF1                  		call	SetDrive
 16411 000013AA 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 16412                                  					; Get physical drive number
 16413 000013AE C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 16414                                  ownloop:
 16415 000013B2 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 16416 000013B6 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 16417                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16418 000013B8 26F6453F20              		test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 20h ; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 16419                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16420                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 16421                                  		;;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16422                                  					; fi_own_physical
 16423 000013BD 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 16424                                  getnextBDS:
 16425 000013BF 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 16426 000013C2 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 16427                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16428                                  
 16429                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16430                                  ;
 16431                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 16432                                  ; in al to al.
 16433                                  ;
 16434                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16435                                  
 16436                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16437                                  
 16438                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16439                                  ioctl_setown:
 16440 000013C4 E8DDF1                  		call	SetDrive
 16441 000013C7 C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 16442                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 16443 000013CC E8A8F5                  		call	checksingle
 16444                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16445 000013CF FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 16446                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 16447                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 16448                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 16449                                  
 16450                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16451                                  ;
 16452                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 16453                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 16454                                  ;
 16455                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16456                                  
 16457                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16458                                  exitown:
 16459 000013D3 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 16460                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16461 000013D5 26F6453F10              		test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 10h ; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 16462                                  		; 12/12/2022
 16463                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 16464                                  		;;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16465                                  					; fi_am_mult
 16466 000013DA 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult
 16467 000013DC 268A4D05                		mov	cl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 16468                                  					; Get logical drive number
 16469                                  					; Get it 1-based
 16470 000013E0 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 16471                                  exitnomult:
 16472 000013E2 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 16473 000013E6 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 16474                                  					; Exit normal termination
 16475                                  		; 12/12/2022
 16476                                  		; cf=0
 16477                                  		;clc
 16478 000013E9 C3                      		retn
 16479

 16501 000013F0 8606[A905]              		xchg	al, [media_set_for_format] ; get current flag setting
