 16537                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16538                                  ;	get media id
 16539                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16540                                  ;
 16541                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 16542                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 16543                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 16544                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 16545                                  ;
 16546                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 16547                                  ;
 16548                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 16549                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 16550                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 16551                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 16552                                  ;
 16553                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 16554                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 16555                                  ;
 16556                                  ; LOGIC:
 16557                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 16558                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 16559                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 16560                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 16561                                  ;
 16562                                  ; {
 16563                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 16564                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 16565                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 16566                                  ;	if (no error) then
 16567                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 16568                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 16569                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 16570                                  ;		};
 16571                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 16572                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 16573                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 16574                                  ;		};
 16575                                  ;	else
 16576                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 16577                                  ;
 16578                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16579                                  
 16580                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 16581                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 16582                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 16583                                  
 16584                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16585                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1478h)
 16586                                  
 16587                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16588                                  GetMediaId:
 16589 00001412 E8B000                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 16590 00001415 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 16591 00001419 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 16592 0000141E E88C00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 16593 00001421 722E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 16594                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 16595 00001423 803E[6701]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 16596                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 16597                                  		;jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 16598                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16599 00001428 7225                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7		
 16600                                  
 16601                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16602                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16603                                  		;mov	si, disksector+26h
 16604                                  		;;;
 16605                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16606                                  		;mov	si, disksector+43h ; BS_FAT32_VolID
 16607 0000142A BE[9401]                		mov	si, disksector+42h ; BS_FAT32_BootSig ; 24/12/2023
 16608 0000142D 833E[6801]00            		cmp	word [disksector+16h], 0 ; BPB.FATSz16
 16609 00001432 7403                    		jz	short IOCtl_If3 ; FAT32 fs
 16610 00001434 83EE1C                  		sub	si, 1Ch         ; FAT (12-16) fs ; 43h-1Ch = 27h ; BS_VolID
 16611                                  		; si = disksector+26h = BS_BootSig ; 24/12/2023
 16612                                  IOCtl_If3:
 16613                                  		;cmp	byte [si-1], 29h ; BS_BootSig or BS_FAT32_BootSig
 16614                                  		;;;
 16615 00001437 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 16616                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 16617                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 16618 0000143A 7512                    		jne	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 16619 0000143C C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 16620 00001440 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 16621                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16622                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 16623 00001444 46                      		inc	si
 16624                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16625                                  		; si = disksector+27h (BS_VolID)
 16626                                  		;      or disksector+43h (BS_FAT32_VolID)
 16627                                  
 16628 00001445 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 16629                                  IOCtl_If4:		; 24/12/2023
 16630 00001448 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 16631                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 16632                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 16633 0000144B F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 16634                                  	
 16635                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16636                                  		; cf = 0
 16637                                  		;clc
 16638                                  
 16639 0000144D C3                      		retn
 16640                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16641                                  
 16642                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16643                                  IOCtl_If2:
 16644 0000144E F9                      		stc	
 16645                                  IOCtl_If7:
 16646 0000144F B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 16647                                  		;stc
 16648                                  IOCtl_If6:
 16649                                  IOCtl_If1:
 16650 00001451 C3                      		retn
 16651                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16652                                  
 16653                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16654                                  
 16655                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16656                                  ;  set media id
 16657                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16658                                  
 16659                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 16660                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 16661                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 16662                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 16663                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 16664                                  ;	    the bds table.
 16665                                  ;
 16666                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 16667                                  ;
 16668                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 16669                                  ;	    the request packet.
 16670                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 16671                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 16672                                  ;
 16673                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 16674                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 16675                                  ;
 16676                                  ; logic:
 16677                                  ;
 16678                                  ; {
 16679                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 16680                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 16681                                  ;	BootIo;
 16682                                  ;	if (no error) then
 16683                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 16684                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 16685                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 16686                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 16687                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 16688                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 16689                                  ;		};
 16690                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 16691                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 16692                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 16693                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 16694                                  ;		};
 16695                                  ;	else
 16696                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 16697                                  ;
 16698                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16699                                  
 16700                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16701                                  
 16702                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16703                                  SetMediaId:
 16704 00001452 E87000                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 16705 00001455 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 16706                                  					; Logical drive	number
 16707 00001459 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 16708 0000145B C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 16709 00001460 52                      		push	dx
 16710 00001461 E84900                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 16711 00001464 5A                      		pop	dx
 16712 00001465 72EA                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 16713                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 16714 00001467 803E[6701]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 16715                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 16716 0000146C 72E1                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 16717                                  
 16718                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16719                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 16720                                  		;			; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 16721                                  		;jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 16722                                  		
 16723 0000146E 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 16724 0000146F 57                      		push	di
 16725 00001470 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 16726 00001471 07                      		pop	es
 16727                                  
 16728                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16729                                  		;;;
 16730                                  		;mov	di, disksector+43h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 16731 00001472 BF[9401]                		mov	di, disksector+42h ; BS_FAT32_BootSig ; 24/12/2023 
 16732 00001475 833E[6801]00            		cmp	word [disksector+16h], 0 ; BPB.FATSz16
 16733 0000147A 7403                    		jz      short IOCtl_If5	; FAT32 fs
 16734 0000147C 83EF1C                  		sub	di, 1Ch		; 67-28 ; offset disksektor+27h
 16735                                  		; di = disksector+26h = BS_BootSig ; 24/12/2023
 16736                                  IOCtl_If5:
 16737                                  		;cmp	byte [di-1], 29h ; BS_BootSig or BS_FAT32_BootSig
 16738 0000147F 803D29                  		cmp	byte [di], 29h
 16739 00001482 7404                    		je	short IOCtl_If8
 16740 00001484 5F                      		pop	di		; not extended boot record
 16741 00001485 07                      		pop	es
 16742                                  		;jmp	short IOCtl_If7
 16743                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16744 00001486 EBC6                    		jmp	short IOCtl_If2
 16745                                  IOCtl_If8:
 16746                                  		;;;
 16747                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16748                                  		;mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 16749 00001488 47                      		inc	di
 16750                                  		; di = disksector+27h (BS_VolID)
 16751                                  		;      or disksector+43h (BS_FAT32_VolID)
 16752                                  
 16753 00001489 C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 16754 0000148D C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 16755 00001490 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 16756                                  		
 16757                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16758                                  		;mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 16759                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 16760                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 16761                                  		;rep movsb
 16762 00001493 E8B2FF                  		call	IOCtl_If4       ; copy volume serial, label and system id
 16763                                  
 16764 00001496 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 16765 00001497 1F                      		pop	ds
 16766 00001498 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 16767 00001499 07                      		pop	es
 16768 0000149A E8B2F3                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 16769 0000149D 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 16770 0000149F C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 16771 000014A4 E80600                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 16772 000014A7 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 16773                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 16774                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 16775 000014AC C3                      		retn
 16776                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16777                                  
 16778                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16779                                  ;IOCtl_If7:
 16780                                  ;		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 16781                                  ;		stc
 16782                                  ;IOCtl_If6:
 16783                                  ;		retn
 16784                                  
 16785                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16786                                  
 16787                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16788                                  
 16789                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16790                                  ;	BootIo
 16791                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16792                                  ;
 16793                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 16794                                  ;
 16795                                  ; input :
 16796                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 16797                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 16798                                  ;
 16799                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 16800                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 16801                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 16802                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 16803                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 16804                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 16805                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 16806                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 16807                                  ;
 16808                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 16809                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 16810                                  ;
 16811                                  ; logic:
 16812                                  ;
 16813                                  ; {
 16814                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 16815                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 16816                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 16817                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 16818                                  ; }
 16819                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16820                                  
 16821                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16822                                  BootIo:	
 16823 000014AD 06                      		push	es
 16824 000014AE 57                      		push	di
 16825 000014AF 53                      		push	bx
 16826 000014B0 1E                      		push	ds
 16827 000014B1 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 16828                                  
 16829                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 16830                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 16831                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 16832                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 16833                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 16834                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 16835                                  
 16836 000014B2 BF[5201]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 16837 000014B5 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 16838 000014B7 8916[9C04]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 16839 000014BB B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 16840 000014BE E850F5                  		call	diskio
 16841 000014C1 5B                      		pop	bx
 16842 000014C2 5F                      		pop	di
 16843 000014C3 07                      		pop	es
 16844 000014C4 C3                      		retn
 16845                                  
 16846                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16847                                  
 16848                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16849                                  
 16850                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16851                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 16852                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16853                                  ;
 16854                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 16855                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 16856                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 16857                                  ; history in the flags.
 16858                                  ;
 16859                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 16860                                  ;
 16861                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 16862                                  ;
 16863                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 16864                                  ;
 16865                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 16866                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 16867                                  ;
 16868                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16869                                  
 16870                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16871                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 16872 000014C5 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 16873 000014C9 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 16874 000014CB 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 16875                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16876 000014CD 26F6453F04              		test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags] ; PCDOS 7.1
 16877                                  		; 12/12/2022
 16878                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 16879                                  		;;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16880                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 16881 000014D2 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 16882 000014D4 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1   ; This rom support change line?
 16883 000014D9 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 16884 000014DB E8AD07                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 16885 000014DE 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 16886                                  
 16887                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 16888                                  
 16889 000014E0 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h

 16891                                  				; DL = drive to	check
 16892                                  				; Return: AH = disk change status

 16907                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16908                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 16909                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16910                                  ;
 16911                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 16912                                  ;
 16913                                  ; INPUT :
 16914                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 16915                                  ;
 16916                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 16917                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 16918                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16919                                  
 16920                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16921                                  
 16922                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16923                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 16924 000014EF C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 16925 000014F3 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 16926                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 16927                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16928 000014F6 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 16929                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16930 000014F8 26F6454002              		test	byte [es:di+40h], 02h ; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 16931                                  		;test	word ptr es:[di+3Fh], 200h
 16932                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16933                                  		;test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 16934                                  		;;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16935                                  					; unformatted_media
 16936 000014FD 7501                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 16937                                  		;inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 16938                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16939 000014FF 40                      		inc	ax
 16940                                  GafDone:				
 16941 00001500 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 16942 00001503 C3                      		retn
 16943                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16944                                  
 16945                                  ; 16/10/2022

 16947                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16948                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 16949                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16950                                  ;
 16951                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 16952                                  ;
 16953                                  ; input :
 16954                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 16955                                  ;
 16956                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 16957                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16958                                  
 16959                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16960                                  
 16961                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16962                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 16963 00001504 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 16964 00001508 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 16965                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16966 0000150B 26806540FD              		and	byte [es:di+40h], 0FDh ; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 16967                                  		;and	word ptr es:[di+3Fh], 0FDFFh
 16968                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16969                                  		;and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 16970                                  		;;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16971                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 16972 00001510 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 16973 00001514 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 16974                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16975 00001516 26804D4002              		or	byte [es:di+40h], 02h ; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 16976                                  		;or	word ptr es:[di+3Fh], 200h
 16977                                  		; 15/04/2024
 16978                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16979                                  		;or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 16980                                  		;;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16981                                  					; unformatted_media
 16982                                  saf_Done:				
 16983 0000151B C3                      		retn

 16988                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16989                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 16990                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16991                                  ;
 16992                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 16993                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 16994                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 16995                                  ;
 16996                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16997                                  
 16998                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16999                                  
 17000                                  		; 19/10/2022
 17001                                  ioctl_support_query:
 17002 0000151C 06                      		push	es
 17003 0000151D C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 17004 00001521 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 17005                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 17006                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17007                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 17008 00001525 3C48                    		cmp	al, 48h		; IOC_NEW_DC (PCDOS 7.1)
 17009                                  					; new generic ioctl function (FAT32)
 17010 00001527 7404                    		je	short ioctl_support
 17011                                  
 17012 00001529 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 17013                                  					; See if major code is 8
 17014 0000152B 7513                    		jne	short nosupport
 17015                                  ioctl_support:
 17016 0000152D 0E                      		push	cs
 17017 0000152E 07                      		pop	es
 17018                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17019                                  		; 02/09/2023
 17020 0000152F B90E00                  		mov	cx, 14          ; (PCDOS 7.1) IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 17021                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 17022                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17023 00001532 BF[BD0E]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 17024                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 17025                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 17026 00001535 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 17027 00001537 F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 17028 00001539 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 17029 0000153B B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 17030                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17031                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 17032                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 17033                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 17034                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 17035                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17036                                  ioctlsupexit:
 17037 0000153E 07                      		pop	es
 17038                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17039                                  		; cf = 0
 17040                                  		;clc
 17041 0000153F C3                      		retn
 17042                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17043                                  nosupport:
 17044 00001540 07                      		pop	es
 17045 00001541 E991EB                  		jmp	bc_cmderr

 17050                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17051                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 17052                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17053                                  ;
 17054                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 17055                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 17056                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 17057                                  ;	    drive)
 17058                                  ;
 17059                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 17060                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 17061                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 17062                                  ;
 17063                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 17064                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 17065                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 17066                                  ;
 17067                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 17068                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 17069                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 17070                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 17071                                  ;
 17072                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 17073                                  ;
 17074                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 17075                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 17076                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 17077                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 17078                                  ; 
 17079                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17080                                  
 17081                                  		; 19/10/2022
 17082                                  SenseMediaType:
 17083 00001544 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 17084 00001548 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 17085                                  		; 10/10/2022
 17086                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 17087 0000154B 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 17088 0000154D 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 17089                                  		;
 17090 0000154F 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 17091                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 17092                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17093                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 17094 00001553 B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 17095                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 17096 00001555 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 17097 00001557 7216                    		jc	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 17098 00001559 FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 17099                                  DetermineMediaType:
 17100 0000155B FEC8                    		dec	al
 17101 0000155D 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 17102 0000155F 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 17103 00001561 0404                    		add	al, 4
 17104 00001563 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 17105 00001565 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 17106 00001567 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 17107 00001569 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 17108                                  GotMediaType:
 17109 0000156B 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 17110                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17111                                  		; cf = 0
 17112                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 17113 0000156E C3                      		retn
 17114                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17115                                  
 17116                                  MediaSenseEr:
 17117 0000156F 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 17118 00001572 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 17119 00001574 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 17120 00001576 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 17121 00001579 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 17122                                  UnknownMediaType:
 17123 0000157B B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 17124                                  SenseErrExit:
 17125 0000157D B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 17126 0000157F F9                      		stc
 17127 00001580 C3                      		retn
 17128                                  
 17129                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17130                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17131                                  		;db    0
 17132                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17133

 17135                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:15F2h
 17136                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17137                                  ; 26/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1)
 17138

 17140                                  
 17141                                  SetLockState:
 17142 00001581 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; set media lock state
 17143 00001585 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+13h]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 17144                                  		;mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 17145                                  		;call	check_int13h_exts_present
 17146                                  		; 26/12/2023
 17147 00001588 E82100                  		call	check_int13h_exts_p
 17148                                  		;mov	al, 3		; unknown command error
 17149 0000158B 721C                    		jc	short setlockst_ret
 17150 0000158D 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; [bx+A_LOCKSTATE_CONTROL.LOCKSTATE_FUNCTIONS]
 17151 0000158F B445                    		mov	ah, 45h
 17152 00001591 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - IBM/MS Extension - LOCK/UNLOCK DRIVE
 17153                                  		; (DL - drive, [SI - disk address packet)
 17154 00001593 884701                  		mov	[bx+1], al	; 1 = locked, 0 = not locked
 17155                                  		; [bx+A_LOCKSTATE_CONTROL.LOCKSTATE_FLAG]
 17156                                  		
 17157                                  		; 26/12/2023
 17158 00001596 EB0A                    		jmp	short sls_em
 17159                                  
 17160                                  ;		jnc	short setlockst_ret
 17161                                  ;		mov	al, ah
 17162                                  ;		call	maperror
 17163                                  ;setlockst_ret:
 17164                                  ;		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in case of carry
 17165                                  ;		retn
 17166                                  
 17167                                  ; =============== S U B R O U T I N E =======================================
 17168                                  
 17169                                  EjectMedia:
 17170                                  		;mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; eject media in drive
 17171                                  		;			; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 17172                                  		;call	check_int13h_exts_present
 17173                                  		; 26/12/2023
 17174 00001598 E81100                  		call	check_int13h_exts_p
 17175                                  		;mov	al, 3		; unknown command error
 17176 0000159B 720C                    		jc	short ejectm_ret
 17177 0000159D B80046                  		mov	ax, 4600h
 17178 000015A0 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - IBM/MS Extension - EJECT MEDIA
 17179                                  		; (DL - drive)
 17180                                  sls_em:			; 26/12/2023
 17181 000015A2 7305                    		jnc	short ejectm_ret
 17182 000015A4 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
 17183 000015A6 E800F8                  		call	maperror
 17184                                  setlockst_ret:		; 26/12/2023
 17185                                  ejectm_ret:
 17186 000015A9 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in case of carry
 17187 000015AB C3                      		retn
 17188                                  
 17189                                  ; =============== S U B R O U T I N E =======================================
 17190                                  
 17191                                  		; 26/12/2023
 17192                                  check_int13h_exts_p:
 17193 000015AC 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]
 17194                                  
 17195                                  check_int13h_exts_present:
 17196 000015B0 B441                    		mov	ah, 41h
 17197 000015B2 53                      		push	bx
 17198 000015B3 BBAA55                  		mov	bx, 55AAh
 17199 000015B6 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - Check for INT 13h Extensions
 17200                                  					; BX = 55AAh, DL = drive number
 17201                                  					; Return: CF set if not supported
 17202                                  					; AH = extensions version
 17203                                  					; BX = AA55h
 17204                                  					; CX = Interface support bit map
 17205 000015B8 81FB55AA                		cmp	bx, 0AA55h
 17206 000015BC 5B                      		pop	bx
 17207 000015BD 7505                    		jnz	short exts_notsupported
 17208 000015BF F6C102                  		test	cl, 2		; bit 1 - drive locking and ejecting subset
 17209 000015C2 7503                    		jnz	short exts_supported
 17210                                  exts_notsupported:
 17211                                  		; 26/12/2023
 17212 000015C4 B003                    		mov	al, 3
 17213                                  		;
 17214 000015C6 F9                      		stc
 17215                                  exts_supported:
 17216 000015C7 C3                      		retn
 17217                                  
 17218                                  ; =============== S U B R O U T I N E =======================================
 17219                                  
 17220                                  GetDrvMapInfo:
 17221 000015C8 8CD9                    		mov	cx, ds		; get drive map information
 17222                                  					;
 17223                                  					; es:di points to BDS which belongs to
 17224                                  					;	  the requested logical/dos drive number
 17225                                  					;
 17226                                  					; Format of parameter block:
 17227                                  					; Offset  Description (Table 01570)
 17228                                  					;  00h    (call) length of this buffer (in bytes)
 17229                                  					;  01h    (ret) number of bytes in parameter block
 17230                                  					;	    actually used
 17231                                  					;  02h    (ret) drive flags
 17232                                  					;  03h    (ret) physical drive number
 17233                                  					;	    00h-7Fh floppy
 17234                                  					;	    80h-FEh hard
 17235                                  					;	    FFh no physical drive
 17236                                  					;  04h    (ret) bitmap of logical drives associated with
 17237                                  					;	    physical drive
 17238                                  					;	    bit 0 = drive A:, etc.
 17239                                  					;  08h    (ret) relative block address of partition start
 17240                                  					;	    qword
 17241                                  					;
 17242                                  					; Ref: Ralf Brown's Interrupt List, INTERRUP.G
 17243 000015CA C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 17244 000015CE C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+13h]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 17245 000015D1 B80381                  		mov	ax, 8103h	; ah = generic ioctl error code (81h)
 17246                                  					; al = unknown command error (03h)
 17247 000015D4 803F10                  		cmp	byte [bx], 10h	; parameter buffer length = 16 bytes
 17248 000015D7 7251                    		jb	short gdmi_4
 17249 000015D9 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 17250 000015DD 885703                  		mov	[bx+3], dl	; parameter block - offset 3 - physical drive number
 17251 000015E0 C6470110                		mov	byte [bx+1], 10h ; parameter block - actually used length
 17252 000015E4 268B4517                		mov	ax, [es:di+17h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensectors]
 17253 000015E8 894708                  		mov	[bx+8], ax	; parameter block - offset 8 - partition start LBA
 17254 000015EB 268B4519                		mov	ax, [es:di+19h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensectors+2]
 17255 000015EF 89470A                  		mov	[bx+0Ah], ax	; parameter block - offset 10
 17256 000015F2 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax ; 0
 17257 000015F4 884702                  		mov	[bx+2], al	; drive flags = 0 (protected mode flags etc.)
 17258 000015F7 89470C                  		mov	[bx+0Ch], ax	; high dword of partition start address (LBA) is 0
 17259 000015FA 89470E                  		mov	[bx+0Eh], ax
 17260 000015FD 894704                  		mov	[bx+4], ax	; logical drive bitmap of same physical drive
 17261                                  					; initialized as 0
 17262 00001600 894706                  		mov	[bx+6], ax ; 0
 17263 00001603 8EC1                    		mov	es, cx
 17264                                  		;les	di, dword ptr es:start_bds ; 1st BDS
 17265 00001605 26C43E[1901]            		les	di, [es:start_bds]
 17266 0000160A B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; bit 0 (drive A:)
 17267                                  gdmi_1:
 17268 0000160D 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; last BDS ?
 17269 00001610 7415                    		jz	short gdmi_3	; yes
 17270 00001612 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum], dl
 17271                                  					; is it same physical drive ?
 17272 00001616 7506                    		jnz	short gdmi_2	; no
 17273 00001618 094F04                  		or	[bx+4], cx	; set bit for logical drive index of this BDS
 17274                                  					; (previously) shifted bit (which is 1/ON) is in ax:cx
 17275 0000161B 094706                  		or	[bx+6], ax
 17276                                  gdmi_2:
 17277 0000161E D1E1                    		shl	cx, 1		; shift one left for setting the next drive's bit
 17278 00001620 D1D0                    		rcl	ax, 1		; set high word of the bit select (set) value
 17279 00001622 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; next BDS
 17280 00001625 EBE6                    		jmp	short gdmi_1	; loop until di = -1 (last BDS sign)
 17281                                  gdmi_3:
 17282 00001627 B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h	; success
 17283                                  gdmi_4:
 17284 0000162A C3                      		retn
 17285                                  
 17286                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17287                                  
 17288                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 17289                                  ; 26/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 17290                                  
 17291                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17292                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 17293                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17294                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 17295                                  
 17296                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 17297                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 17298                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 17299                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 17300                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 17301                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 17302                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 17303                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 17304                                  ;
 17305                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 17306                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 17307                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 17308                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 17309                                  ;
 17310                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 17311                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 17312                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 17313                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 17314                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 17315                                  ;
 17316                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 17317                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 17318                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 17319                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 17320                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 17321                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 17322                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 17323                                  
 17324                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 17325                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022
 17326                                  
 17327                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 17328                                  ;BIOSCODE:16AAh (PCDOS 7.1, IBMBIO.COM) ; 26/12/2023
 17329                                  
 17330                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 17331 0000162B 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 17332 0000162E 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 17333 00001630 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 17334 00001633 7432                    		jz	short mine
 17335                                  
 17336                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 17337                                  
 17338 00001635 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 17339 00001638 746D                    		jz	short win386call
 17340 0000163A 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 17341 0000163D 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 17342 0000163F E99800                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 17343                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17344                                  
 17345                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 17346 00001642 CF                      		iret
 17347                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17348                                  
 17349                                  int2f_replace_int13:

 17354                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 17355                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 17356 00001647 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 17357                                  		; 19/10/2022
 17358                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 17359                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 17360                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 17361                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2

 17372                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es

 17388 00001665 58                      		pop	ax
 17389                                  i2f_iret:

 17468                                  ; WIN386 startup stuff is done here. If starting up we set our WIN386 present
 17469                                  ; flag and return instance data. If exiting, we reset the WIN386 present flag
 17470                                  ; NOTE: We assume that the BIOS int 2fh is at the bottom of the chain.
 17471                                  
 17472                                  win386call:
 17473 000016A7 1E                      		push	ds
 17474 000016A8 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 17475                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 17476                                  					; at 2C7h:30h =	70h:25A0h

 17478                                  					; is it	win386 initializing?
 17479 000016AF 7410                    		jz	short Win386Init
 17480 000016B1 3C06                    		cmp	al, 6		; Win386_Exit
 17481                                  					; is it	win386 exiting?
 17482 000016B3 7523                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not, continue int2f chain
 17483                                  		; 12/12/2022
 17484 000016B5 F6C201                  		test	dl, 1
 17485                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it	win386 or win286 dos extender?
 17486 000016B8 751E                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 17487                                  		;and	ds:IsWin386, 0	; indicate that	win386 is not present  
 17488 000016BA 8026[1208]00            		and	byte [IsWin386], 0

 17497                                  		;or	ds:IsWin386, 1	; Indicate WIN386 present
 17498 000016C6 800E[1208]01            		or	byte [IsWin386], 1

 17500                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next+2, es

 17509                                  ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022
 17510                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret	; return back up the chain

 17515                                  handle_multmult:
 17516 000016DA 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1
 17517 000016DC 7514                    		jnz	short try_2
 17518 000016DE 1E                      		push	ds
 17519 000016DF E84500                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 17520                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17521                                  		;xor	bx, bx
 17522                                  		;dec	bx
 17523 000016E2 BBFFFF                  		mov	bx, 0FFFFh
 17524 000016E5 8EC3                    		mov	es, bx		; seg of HMA
 17525 000016E7 89FB                    		mov	bx, di
 17526 000016E9 F7D3                    		not	bx
 17527 000016EB 09DB                    		or	bx, bx
 17528 000016ED 7401                    		jz	short try_1
 17529 000016EF 43                      		inc	bx
 17530                                  try_1:

 17534 000016F1 CF                      		iret

 17536                                  
 17537                                  try_2:
 17538 000016F2 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; multMULTALLOCHMA
 17539 000016F4 7530                    		jnz	short try_3
 17540 000016F6 1E                      		push	ds
 17541                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17542                                  		;xor	di, di
 17543                                  		;dec	di
 17544 000016F7 BFFFFF                  		mov	di, 0FFFFh	; assume not enough space
 17545 000016FA 8EC7                    		mov	es, di

 17547 000016FF 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 17548 00001702 7421                    		jz	short InsuffHMA

 17550 00001706 39FB                    		cmp	bx, di
 17551 00001708 7605                    		jbe	short try_4
 17552                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17553                                  		;sub	di, di
 17554                                  		;dec	di
 17555 0000170A BFFFFF                  		mov	di, 0FFFFh
 17556                                  		;jmp	short InsuffHMA
 17557                                  		; 02/09/2023
 17558 0000170D 1F                      		pop	ds

 17566                                  		;and	bx, 0FFF0h
 17567                                  		; 10/12/2022
