 37450                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37451                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 37452                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 37453                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37454                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 37455                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 37456                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 37457                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 37458                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37459                                  
 37460                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37461                                  	; (SYSINIT:3344h)
 37462                                  findUMB:
 37463                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37464                                  	;push	ax
 37465                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37466 000032D3 51                      	push	cx ; *
 37467                                  	;push	dx
 37468                                  
 37469 000032D4 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 37470                                  
 37471 000032D6 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 37472                                  
 37473 000032D8 E8D2FE                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 37474                                  	; 22/07/2023
 37475                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 37476 000032DB 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 37477                                  
 37478                                  	; 22/07/2023
 37479                                  fu10:
 37480 000032DD 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; **
 37481                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 37482                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 37483                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 37484                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 37485                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 37486                                  
 37487                                  ;fu10:	
 37488 000032DF 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 37489 000032E1 7417                    	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 37490                                  
 37491 000032E3 E8D4FE                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 37492 000032E6 7501                    	jnz	short fu20
 37493                                  
 37494 000032E8 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 37495                                  fu20:	
 37496                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 37497                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 37498                                  	; 19/07/2023
 37499 000032E9 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end 
 37500 000032EF 7408                    	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 37501                                  
 37502                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 37503                                  	; 22/07/2023
 37504                                  	; ax = es
 37505                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 22/07/2023
 37506                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 37507 000032F1 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 37508 000032F6 40                      	inc	ax
 37509                                  	; 22/07/2023
 37510                                  	;mov	es,ax ; **
 37511 000032F7 EBE4                    	jmp	short fu10
 37512                                  fuE:	
 37513 000032F9 F9                      	stc
 37514                                  fuX:
 37515                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37516                                  	;pop	dx
 37517                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37518 000032FA 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 37519                                  	;pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 37520 000032FB C3                      	retn
 37521                                  
 37522                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37523                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 37524                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37525                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 37526                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 37527                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 37528                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 37529                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37530                                  
 37531                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 37532                                  BigFree:
 37533                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37534                                  	;push	bx
 37535 000032FC 51                      	push	cx
 37536                                  
 37537 000032FD E8D3FF                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 37538 00003300 723A                    	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 37539                                  
 37540 00003302 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 37541 00003304 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 37542                                  
 37543                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 37544                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 37545                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 37546                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 37547                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 37548                                  
 37549                                  bf10:	
 37550 00003306 E8B1FE                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 37551 00003309 7428                    	jz	short bf30
 37552                                  
 37553                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 37554 0000330B 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 37555 00003311 750C                    	jnz	short bf20
 37556                                  
 37557 00003313 26A10300                	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 37558                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 37559 00003317 39C1                    	cmp	cx,ax
 37560                                  	;jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 37561                                  	; 19/07/2023
 37562 00003319 7D04                    	jge	short bf20
 37563                                  
 37564 0000331B 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 37565                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 37566 0000331D 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 37567                                  
 37568                                  bf20:	
 37569                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 37570                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 37571                                  	; 19/07/2023
 37572                                  	;cmp	byte [es:0],'Z'
 37573 0000331F 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 37574 00003325 740C                    	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 37575                                  
 37576                                  	;NextMCB es,ax			; Go on forward.
 37577 00003327 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 37578                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 37579 00003329 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 37580 0000332E 40                      	inc     ax
 37581 0000332F 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 37582                                  
 37583 00003331 EBD3                    	jmp	short bf10
 37584                                  
 37585 00003333 8EC3                    bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 37586 00003335 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 37587 00003337 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 37588 00003339 7501                    	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 37589                                  bfE:	
 37590 0000333B F9                      	stc
 37591                                  bfX:
 37592 0000333C 59                      	pop	cx
 37593                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37594                                  	;pop	bx
 37595 0000333D C3                      	retn
 37596                                  
 37597                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37598                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 37599                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37600                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 37601                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 37602                                  ; ERROR:    None
 37603                                  ; USES:     Flags

 37607                                  
 37608                                  isSpecified:
 37609                                  	; 02/01/2023

 37611

 37614                                  
 37615                                  	;getdata al,DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 37616                                  	;
 37617                                  	;push	ds
 37618                                  	;push	cs
 37619                                  	;pop	ds
 37620                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 37621                                  	;pop	ds
 37622                                  	
 37623                                  	;mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 37624                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37625                                  	; ds = cs
 37626 00003342 8A87[0024]              	mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 37627                                  
 37628 00003346 08C0                    	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 37629                                  
 37630                                  	; 09/09/2023
 37631                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37632                                  	;pop	ax
 37633                                  
 37634 00003348 C3                      	retn
 37635                                  
 37636                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37637                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 37638                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37639                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 37640                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 37641                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 37642                                  ; USES:     Flags
 37643                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37644                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 37645                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 37646                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 37647                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 37648                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 37649                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37650                                  
 37651                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 37652                                  
 37653                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37654                                  
 37655                                  shrinkMCB:
 37656                                  	;pushreg <bx,cx,es>
 37657                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37658                                  	;push	bx
 37659 00003349 51                      	push	cx
 37660 0000334A 06                      	push	es
 37661                                  
 37662 0000334B 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 37663                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37664                                  	;mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 37665                                  
 37666 0000334D 268B0E0300              	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 37667                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37668 00003352 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx 
 37669                                  
 37670 00003354 83E820                  	sub	ax,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 37671                                  	;sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 37672                                  	;;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 37673                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 37674                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37675                                  	;cmp	cx,bx
 37676                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37677 00003357 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx
 37678 00003359 7228                    	jb	short smE ; (*)
 37679                                  
 37680 0000335B 268A160000              	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 37681                                  	
 37682                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 37683                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37684 00003360 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 37685                                  
 37686 00003362 26891E0300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 37687 00003367 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 37688                                  
 37689 0000336D 01D8                    	add	ax,bx
 37690 0000336F 40                      	inc	ax
 37691 00003370 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 37692                                  
 37693 00003372 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 37694 00003374 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx
 37695                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37696                                  	; ax > 0
 37697 00003376 48                      	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 37698                                  
 37699                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37700 00003377 2688160000              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 37701                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 37702 0000337C 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 37703                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 37704                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 37705                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 37706                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 37707                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 37708                                  
 37709                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37710 00003380 E8A801                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 37711                                  
 37712                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37713                                  	; cf=0
 37714                                  	;clc
 37715                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37716                                  	;jmp	short smX
 37717                                  smE:	
 37718                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37719                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 37720                                  	;stc
 37721                                  smX:	
 37722                                  	;popreg	<es,cx,bx>
 37723 00003383 07                      	pop	es
 37724 00003384 59                      	pop	cx
 37725                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37726                                  	;pop	bx
 37727 00003385 C3                      	retn
 37728                                  
 37729                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37730                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 37731                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37732                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 37733                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 37734                                  ; ERROR:    None
 37735                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 37736                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37737                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 37738                                  ;
 37739                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 37740                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 37741                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 37742                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 37743                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 37744                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 37745                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 37746                                  ;       Endif
 37747                                  ;    Endif
 37748                                  ; Endif
 37749                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 37750                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 37751                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 37752                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 37753                                  ;    ENDIF
 37754                                  ; ENDIF
 37755                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37756                                  
 37757                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37758                                  	; (SYSINIT:3426h)
 37759                                  _hideUMB_:
 37760                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37761                                  	; ds = cs
 37762                                  
 37763                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37764                                  	;push	bx
 37765                                  	;push	dx
 37766 00003386 06                      	push	es
 37767                                  
 37768 00003387 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 37769 00003389 E8B2FF                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 37770 0000338C 742D                    	jz	short hu_20
 37771                                  
 37772 0000338E 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 37773 00003390 E869FF                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 37774 00003393 7226                    	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 37775                                  
 37776 00003395 50                      	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 37777 00003396 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 37778 00003398 E8AAFE                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 37779 0000339B 5B                      	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 37780                                  
 37781 0000339C 09C0                    	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 37782 0000339E 741B                    	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 37783                                  
 37784 000033A0 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 37785 000033A2 7607                    	jbe	short hu_10
 37786                                  
 37787 000033A4 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		;  Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 37788 000033A6 E81DFD                  	call	unMarkUMB
 37789 000033A9 EB10                    	jmp	short hu_20
 37790                                  hu_10:	
 37791                                  	;call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 37792                                  	;jz	short hu_20
 37793                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37794                                  ;isTiny:
 37795                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny] ; ds = cs
 37796                                  	;or	al,al
 37797 000033AB 800E[FC23]00            	or	byte [fUmbTiny],0
 37798 000033B0 7409                    	jz	short hu_20
 37799                                  
 37800 000033B2 E894FF                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 37801 000033B5 7204                    	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 37802                                  
 37803 000033B7 8CC2                    	mov	dx,es
 37804 000033B9 EB09                    	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 37805                                  
 37806 000033BB 89C8                    hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 37807 000033BD E87EFF                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 37808 000033C0 7510                    	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 37809                                  
 37810 000033C2 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 37811                                  hu_30:	
 37812 000033C4 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 37813                                  
 37814 000033C6 E89DFE                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 37815                                  
 37816 000033C9 09D2                    	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 37817 000033CB 7405                    	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 37818                                  
 37819 000033CD 8EC2                    	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 37820 000033CF E8E6FE                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 37821                                  hu_X:	
 37822 000033D2 07                      	pop	es
 37823                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37824                                  	;pop	dx
 37825                                  	;pop	bx
 37826 000033D3 C3                      	retn
 37827                                  
 37828                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37829                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 37830                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37831                                  ; Entry:  None
 37832                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 37833                                  ; Error:  None
 37834                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 37835                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37836                                  
 37837                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37838                                  UnFreeze:
 37839                                  	; 03/01/2023
 37840                                  	;push	ax
 37841 000033D4 06                      	push	es
 37842                                  
 37843 000033D5 E8D5FD                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 37844 000033D8 721C                    	jc	short ufX
 37845                                  
 37846                                  	; 22/07/2023
 37847                                  uf10:
 37848 000033DA 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; *
 37849                                  
 37850                                  ; ------------------------------
 37851                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 37852                                  ; ------------------------------
 37853                                  
 37854                                  ;uf10:	
 37855 000033DC E81900                  	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 37856 000033DF 7505                    	jnz	short uf20
 37857 000033E1 E8D4FE                  	call	unHideMCB
 37858                                  	; 09/09/2023
 37859                                  	; ax <> es

 38017                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38018                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 38019                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38020                                  ; ENTRY:    None

 38022                                  ; ERROR:    None
 38023                                  ; USES:     CF (AX,BX,DS,ES pushed 'cause they're used by others)

 38105                                  	;mov	ax,es
 38106

 38108

 38111                                  	;pop	bx ; ?
 38112                                  	;pop	ax ; ?
 38113                                  	
 38114 000034AA C3                      	retn

 38370                                  HeadUmb:

 38435                                  ;
 38436                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 38437                                  ;
 38438                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 38439                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 38440                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 38441                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 38442                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 38443                                  ;
 38444                                  ;	Output : none
 38445                                  ;
 38446                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 38447                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 38448                                  ;
 38449                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38450                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 38451                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 38452                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 38453                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 38454                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38455                                  
 38456                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38457                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38458                                  	; (SYSINIT:364Ah)
 38459                                  InitDevLoad:
 38460                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38461                                  	;push	es ; *
 38462                                  
 38463                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38464                                  	; ds = cs
 38465 00003565 803E[5124]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 38466                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 38467                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 38468 0000356A 7439                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 38469                                  
 38470                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38471                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38472                                  ; %if 0
 38473                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38474 0000356C 803E[4124]01            	cmp	byte [ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 38475                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 38476 00003571 7413                    	je	short InitForConv
 38477                                  
 38478                                  ; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 38479                                  ; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 38480                                  ; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 38481                                  ; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 38482                                  ; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 38483                                  ; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 38484                                  
 38485 00003573 E85904                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 38486                                  
 38487 00003576 E892FC                  	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 38488 00003579 E8CBFE                  	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 38489 0000357C E85700                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 38490 0000357F 9C                      	pushf
 38491 00003580 E851FE                  	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 38492 00003583 9D                      	popf
 38493                                  	;jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 38494                                  	;jmp	short InitForHi
 38495                                  	; 06/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38496 00003584 EB0B                    	jmp	short idl0
 38497                                  
 38498                                  ;%endif ; 01/11/2022
 38499                                  
 38500                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38501                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 38502                                  InitForConv:
 38503                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38504                                  	; ds = cs
 38505 00003586 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 38506                                  					;  current UMB ?
 38507 00003589 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 38508 0000358B E84104                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 38509 0000358E E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 38510                                  idl0: ; 06/07/2023
 38511 00003591 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 38512                                  					;  in low memory
 38513                                  InitForHi:
 38514                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38515                                  	; ds = cs
 38516                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 38517                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 38518                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 38519 00003593 A1[4724]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 38520 00003596 8B16[4324]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 38521 0000359A 0316[4524]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 38522 0000359E EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 38523                                  
 38524                                  InitForLo:
 38525                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38526                                  	; ds = cs
 38527                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 38528 000035A0 C606[5124]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 38529                                  initforlo_x:
 38530                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38531                                  	; ds = cs
 38532                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 38533                                  					;  we are loading low
 38534                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 38535                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 38536 000035A5 A1[6403]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 38537 000035A8 8B16[A502]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 38538                                  idl1:
 38539 000035AC E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 38540                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38541                                  	; ds = cs
 38542                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 38543                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 38544                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 38545                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 38546 000035AF A3[3524]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 38547 000035B2 8916[3724]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 38548 000035B6 C706[3924]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 38549 000035BC A3[3B24]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 38550                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38551                                  	;pop	es ; *
 38552 000035BF C3                      	retn
 38553                                  
 38554                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38555                                  ;
 38556                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 38557                                  ;
 38558                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 38559                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 38560                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 38561                                  ;		   current UMB
 38562                                  ;
 38563                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38564                                  
 38565                                  SpaceInUMB:
 38566                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38567                                  	; ds = cs

 38570                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 38571 000035C0 A1[4524]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 38572 000035C3 0306[4324]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 38573 000035C7 2B06[4724]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 38574                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38575                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 38576                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 38577                                  	;stc
 38578                                  	;retn
 38579                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38580 000035CB 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 38581 000035CE 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 38582                                  spcinumb1:
 38583 000035D0 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 38584                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38585                                  	; ds = cs
 38586 000035D1 3B06[3324]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 38587                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 38588                                  spcinumb2:
 38589 000035D5 C3                      	retn

 38592                                  ;
 38593                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 38594                                  ;
 38595                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 38596                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 38597                                  ;
 38598                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 38600                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38601                                  ;
 38602                                  ;PrepareMark:
 38603                                  ;	push	ds
 38604                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 38605                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 38606                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 38607                                  ;	pop	ds
 38608                                  ;

 38610                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax

 38615                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38616                                  ;
 38617                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 38618                                  ;
 38619                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 38620                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 38621                                  ;		 the device.
 38622                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 38623                                  ;
 38624                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 38625                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 38626                                  ;	UMB.
 38627                                  ;
 38628                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 38629                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 38630                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 38631                                  ;
 38632                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38633                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38634                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 38635                                  
 38636                                  GetUMBForDev:
 38637                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38638                                  	; ds = cs
 38639 000035D6 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 38640 000035D9 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 38641 000035DC CD21                    	int	21h
 38642                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 38643                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 38644                                  
 38645 000035DE 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 38646                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 38647                                  	; 09/09/2023
 38648 000035E0 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 38649                                  
 38650 000035E2 4B                      	dec	bx
 38651                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38652                                  	; ds = cs
 38653 000035E3 391E[3324]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 38654                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 38655 000035E7 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 38656                                  
 38657 000035E9 43                      	inc	bx
 38658                                  
 38659 000035EA B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 38660 000035ED CD21                    	int	21h
 38661 000035EF 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 38662                                  
 38663                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38664                                  	;dec	ax
 38665                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 38666                                  	;
 38667                                  PrepareMark:
 38668 000035F1 1E                      	push	ds
 38669 000035F2 48                      	dec	ax
 38670 000035F3 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 38671 000035F5 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 38672 000035FB C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 38673 00003601 40                      	inc	ax
 38674 00003602 1F                      	pop	ds
 38675                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38676                                  	; ds = cs
 38677                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 38678                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 38679                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 38680                                  gufd_x:		; 09/09/2023
 38681 00003603 891E[4524]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 38682 00003607 A3[4324]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 38683 0000360A A3[4724]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 38684                                  	;
 38685                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38686                                  	; cf=0
 38687                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 38688 0000360D C3                      	retn
 38689

 38691                                  %if 1
 38692                                  gufd_err:

 38694                                  gufd_error:

 38698                                  %endif

 38700                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38701                                  %if 0
 38702                                  gufd_err:
 38703                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 38704                                  	; 11/12/2022

 38717                                  ;
 38718                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 38719                                  ;
 38720                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 38721                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 38722                                  ;
 38723                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 38724                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 38725                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 38726                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 38727                                  ;
 38728                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 38729                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 38730                                  ;
 38731                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38732                                  
 38733                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38734                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 38735                                  
 38736                                  DevSetMark:
 38737 00003615 06                      	push	es
 38738                                  	; 03/01/2023
 38739                                  	;push	di
 38740 00003616 1E                      	push	ds
 38741 00003617 56                      	push	si
 38742 00003618 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 38743 0000361A 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 38744 00003620 40                      	inc	ax
 38745 00003621 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 38746                                  
 38747                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 38748                                  
 38749 00003625 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 38750                                  
 38751                                  	; 09/09/2023
 38752                                  	; ds = cs
 38753                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 38754 00003626 C536[8103]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]
 38755                                  
 38756 0000362A 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 38757 0000362C FC                      	cld
 38758                                  dsm_again:
 38759 0000362D AC                      	lodsb
 38760 0000362E 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 38761 00003630 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 38762 00003632 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 38763 00003634 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 38764                                  isit_slash:
 38765 00003636 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 38766 00003638 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 38767 0000363A 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 38768 0000363C EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 38769                                  isit_null:
 38770 0000363E 08C0                    	or	al,al
 38771 00003640 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 38772 00003642 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 38773                                  
 38774 00003644 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 38775 00003647 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 38776                                  dsm_next_char:
 38777 0000364A AC                      	lodsb
 38778 0000364B 08C0                    	or	al, al
 38779 0000364D 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 38780 0000364F 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 38781 00003651 7403                    	je	short blankout
 38782 00003653 AA                      	stosb
 38783 00003654 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 38784                                  blankout:
 38785 00003656 E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 38786 00003658 B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 38787 0000365A F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 38788                                  dsm_exit:
 38789 0000365C 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 38790 0000365D 5E                      	pop	si
 38791 0000365E 1F                      	pop	ds
 38792                                  	; 03/01/2023
 38793                                  	;pop	di
 38794 0000365F 07                      	pop	es
 38795 00003660 C3                      	retn
 38796                                  
 38797                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38798                                  ;
 38799                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 38800                                  ;
 38801                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 38802                                  ;
 38803                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 38804                                  ;
 38805                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 38806                                  ;	in DevSize
 38807                                  ;
 38808                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38809                                  
 38810                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38811                                  SizeDevice:
 38812                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38813                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 38814 00003661 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 38815 00003662 06                      	push	es
 38816 00003663 1F                      	pop	ds
 38817 00003664 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx -> file name
 38818 00003666 B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 38819 00003669 CD21                    	int	21h
 38820 0000366B 7237                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 38821                                  
 38822 0000366D 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 38823 0000366F B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 38824 00003672 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 38825 00003674 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 38826 00003676 CD21                    	int	21h
 38827 00003678 7223                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 38828 0000367A 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 38829 0000367D 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 38830 00003680 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffffh paras ?
 38831                                  	;jz	short szdev1		; no
 38832                                  	; 22/07/2023
 38833 00003684 7409                    	jz	short sd_ctp
 38834 00003686 2EC706[3324]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 38835                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 38836 0000368D EB0E                    	jmp	short sd_close
 38837                                  sd_ctp:	
 38838                                  	; 22/07/2023
 38839                                  ;szdev1:
 38840 0000368F B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 38841 00003691 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 38842 00003693 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 38843 00003695 D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 38844 00003697 09D0                    	or	ax,dx ; * ; cf=0
 38845                                  	;
 38846                                  	; 22/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimized)
 38847                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:37A6h 
 38848                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38849                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 38850                                  	;ja	short szdev2
 38851                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 38852                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38853                                  	;clc
 38854                                  ;szdev2:
 38855 00003699 2EA3[3324]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size (in paragraps)
 38856                                  	; 22/07/2023
 38857                                  	;clc ; cf=0 ; *	; CLC is not needed here
 38858                                  			; (OR instruction clears CF) - E.TAN 22/07/2023
 38859                                  
 38860                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38861                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38862                                  	; cf=0
 38863                                  	;clc
 38864                                  sd_close:
 38865 0000369D 9C                      	pushf				; let close not spoil our

 39248                                  ;
 39249                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 39250                                  ;
 39251                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 39252                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 39253                                  ;
 39254                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 39255                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 39256                                  ;
 39257                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 39258                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 39259                                  ;
 39260                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39261                                  
 39262                                  ; 13/05/2019
 39263                                  
 39264                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39265                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 39266                                  
 39267                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 39268                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 39269                                  GetHexNum:
 39270 00003799 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 39271 0000379B 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 39272                                  ghn_next:
 39273 0000379D 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 39274 000037A0 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 39275 000037A3 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 39276 000037A5 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 39277 000037A8 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 39278 000037AA 50                      	push	ax
 39279 000037AB 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 39280 000037AD E8DA0F                  	call	delim
 39281 000037B0 58                      	pop	ax
 39282                                  	; 03/01/2023
 39283 000037B1 B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 39284 000037B4 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 39285 000037B6 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 39286                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 39287                                  	; 11/12/2022
 39288 000037B9 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 39289                                  	; 03/01/2023
 39290                                  	;mov	cx,4
 39291                                  ghn_shift1:
 39292 000037BB D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 39293 000037BD D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 39294 000037BF E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 39295 000037C1 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 39296 000037C3 46                      	inc	si
 39297 000037C4 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 39298                                  ghn_into_paras:
 39299 000037C6 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 39300 000037C9 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 39301 000037CC F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 39302 000037D0 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 39303                                  	; 03/01/2023
 39304                                  	;mov	cx,4
 39305                                  ghn_shift2:
 39306 000037D2 F8                      	clc
 39307 000037D3 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 39308 000037D5 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 39309 000037D7 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 39310 000037D9 F8                      	clc
 39311 000037DA C3                      	retn
 39312                                  	; 11/12/2022
 39313                                  ghn_err:
 39314                                  gnib_err:
 39315 000037DB F9                      	stc
 39316                                  ghn_ret:
 39317                                  gnib_ret:
 39318 000037DC C3                      	retn

 39321                                  ;
 39322                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 39323                                  ;
 39324                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 39325                                  ;
 39326                                  ;	Returns binary value in BL
 39327                                  ;
 39328                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 39329                                  ;
 39330                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39331                                  
 39332                                  GetNibble:
 39333 000037DD 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 39334                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 39335                                  	; 11/12/2022
 39336 000037E0 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 39337 000037E2 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 39338 000037E5 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 39339 000037E7 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 39340 000037EA C3                      	retn
 39341                                  is_it_hex:
 39342 000037EB 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 39343                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 39344                                  	; 11/12/2022
 39345 000037EE 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 39346 000037F0 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 39347 000037F3 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 39348 000037F5 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 39349 000037F8 C3                      	retn
 39350                                  
 39351                                  	; 11/12/2022
 39352                                  ;gnib_err:
 39353                                  ;	stc
 39354                                  ;gnib_ret:
 39355                                  ;	retn

 39370                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39371                                  ;
 39372                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 39373                                  ;
 39374                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 39375                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 39376                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 39377                                  ;			; DS = data
 39378                                  ;
 39379                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 39380                                  ;
 39381                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 39382                                  ;
 39383                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39384                                  
 39385                                  umb_insert:
 39386 000037F9 1E                      	push	ds
 39387                                  
 39388                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39389                                  	; ds = cs
 39390                                  
 39391                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 39392 000037FA 8E1E[6024]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 39393                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 39394 000037FE 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 39395 00003802 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 39396 00003804 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 39397                                  ui_next:
 39398 00003806 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 39399                                  					;    new block
 39400 00003808 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 39401                                  					; Q: is current block the
 39402                                  					;    last
 39403 0000380A 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 39404 00003810 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 39405                                  					; N: get next block

 39407                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 39408 00003814 E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 39409 00003817 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 39410                                  
 39411                                  ui_insert:

 39414

 39417                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 39418 00003820 C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 39419                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 39420 00003825 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 39421                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 39422 0000382B 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx

 39425

 39427

 39431                                  					; mark as free

 39433                                  					; start & end of new block
 39434 00003847 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 39435

 39437

 39444                                  					; this block

 39446

 39448 0000385A 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 39449 00003861 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 39450 00003865 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 39451                                  
 39452 0000386C EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 39453                                  
 39454                                  ui_append:
 39455                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 39456 0000386E 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 39457 00003873 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 39458                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 39459                                  					; block for the next arena.

 39464 00003881 40                      	inc	ax

 39466                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 39467 00003884 F7D8                    	neg	ax

 39487                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022

 39492                                  ;
 39493                                  ; procedure : AllocUMB
 39494                                  ;
 39495                                  ;	Allocate all UMBs and link it to DOS arena chain
 39496                                  ;
 39497                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39498                                  
 39499                                  AllocUMB:
 39500                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39501                                  	; ds = cs
 39502 000038B7 E84700                  	call	InitAllocUMB		; link in the first UMB

 39504                                  au_next:
 39505 000038BC E87000                  	call	umb_allocate		; allocate
 39506 000038BF 7205                    	jc	short au_coalesce
 39507 000038C1 E835FF                  	call	umb_insert		; & insert till no UMBs
 39508 000038C4 EBF6                    	jmp	short au_next
 39509                                  au_coalesce:
 39510                                  	; 09/09/2023
 39511                                  ;	call	umb_coalesce		; coalesce all UMBs
 39512                                  ;au_exit:
 39513                                  ;	; 31/12/2022
 39514                                  ;	; ds = cs
 39515                                  ;	retn
 39516                                  
 39517                                  	; 09/09/2023
 39518                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 39519                                  
 39520                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39521                                  
 39522                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 39523                                  
 39524                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39525                                  ;
 39526                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 39527                                  ;
 39528                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 39529                                  ;	if it's free. Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 39530                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 39531                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 39532                                  ;
 39533                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 39534                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 39535                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IF not at end
 39536                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 39537                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 39538                                  ;
 39539                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39540                                  
 39541                                  umb_coalesce:
 39542                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39543                                  	; ds = cs
 39544 000038C6 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 39545                                  
 39546 000038C7 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 39547                                  
 39548                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 39549                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39550 000038C9 8E06[6024]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 39551 000038CD 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 39552                                  uc_nextfree:
 39553 000038D2 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 39554 000038D4 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 39555                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 39556 000038D6 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 39557 000038DB 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 39558                                  					; N: get next arena
 39559 000038DD E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 39560 000038E0 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 39561 000038E2 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 39562                                  uc_again:
 39563 000038E4 E86400                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 39564 000038E7 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 39565                                  uc_check:
 39566 000038E9 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 39567 000038EE 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 39568                                  					; Y: coalesce
 39569 000038F0 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 39570 000038F5 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 39571                                  	;add	[3],cx
 39572 000038F6 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 39573 000038FA 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 39574 000038FD 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 39575 000038FF EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 39576                                  
 39577                                  	; 18/12/2022
 39578                                  ;uc_done:
 39579                                  	;retn
 39580

 39594                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39595                                  	; ds = cs
 39596                                  	;mov	[cs:DevDOSData],es	; & save it for later
 39597 0000390A 8C06[6024]              	mov	[DevDOSData],es		; & save it for later

 39599 00003911 CD2F                    	int	2Fh

 39601                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr+2],es
 39602 00003913 891E[4924]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr],bx		; get XMS driver address
 39603 00003917 8C06[4B24]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr+2],es	
 39604                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39605 0000391B 803E[5F24]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0 
 39606                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0 ; have we already linked a UMB?

 39628                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39629                                  ;
 39630                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 39631                                  ;
 39632                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 39633                                  ;
 39634                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 39635                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 39636                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 39637                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 39638                                  ;				NC
 39639                                  ;			  else 
 39640                                  ;				CY
 39641                                  ;
 39642                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 39643                                  ;
 39644                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39645                                  
 39646                                  umb_allocate:
 39647                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39648                                  	; ds = cs
 39649 0000392F 50                      	push	ax
 39650 00003930 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 39651 00003932 BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 39652                                  					;   possible
 39653                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39654 00003935 FF1E[4924]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 39655                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 39656                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 39657                                  					; the largest UMB
 39658 00003939 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 39659 0000393B 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 39660                                  	
 39661 0000393D B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 39662                                  
 39663                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39664 0000393F FF1E[4924]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 39665                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 39666                                  
 39667 00003943 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 39668                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 39669                                  	; 27/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 39670 00003946 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 39671                                  ua_err:
 39672 00003948 F9                      	stc	
 39673                                  
 39674                                  	;clc
 39675                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39676                                  	; 12/12/2022
 39677                                  	; cf=0
 39678                                  	;clc 
 39679                                  ua_done:
 39680 00003949 58                      	pop	ax
 39681 0000394A C3                      	retn
 39682                                  	; 27/07/2023
 39683                                  ;ua_err:
 39684                                  	;stc
 39685                                  	;jmp	short ua_done

 39687                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39688                                  ;
 39689                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 39690                                  ;
 39691                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 39692                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 39693                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 39694                                  ;
 39695                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39696                                  
 39697                                  	; 01/11/2022
 39698                                  get_next:
 39699 0000394B 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 39700 00003950 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 39701                                  _get_next_:
 39702 00003952 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 39703 00003954 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 39704 00003958 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 39705 00003959 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 39706                                  	;clc
 39707                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39708                                  	; 11/12/2022
 39709                                  	; cf=0
 39710                                  	;clc
 39711 0000395B C3                      	retn
 39712                                  gn_err:
 39713 0000395C F9                      	stc
 39714                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 39715                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 39716 0000395D C3                      	retn
