 41823 0000415E 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 41824 00004160 1E                              push    ds              ;
 41825 00004161 8E1E[6219]                      mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 41826 00004165 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 41827                                  
 41828                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 41829                                  ;
 41830                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 41831                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 41832                                  ;   within the requested block. Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 41833                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion; the amount of recursion is
 41834                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 41835                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 41836                                  ;
 41837                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 41838                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 41839                                  
 41840                                  copyblock_loop:
 41841 00004167 53                              push    bx              ; save selected block name
 41842 00004168 E82F01                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 41843 0000416B 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 41844 0000416C 7232                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 41845                                  
 41846                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons: it hit eof or a new block
 41847                                  
 41848                                  copyblock_begin:
 41849                                  
 41850                                  ; 10/09/2023
 41851                                  %if 0
 41852                                          push    ax              ;
 41853                                          push    cx              ;
 41854                                          push    si              ;
 41855                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 41856                                          mov     di,szCommon
 41857                                          push    ds              ;
 41858                                          push    cs              ;
 41859                                          pop     ds              ;
 41860                                          call    comp_names      ;
 41861                                          pop     ds              ;
 41862                                          pop     di              ;
 41863                                          pop     si              ;
 41864                                          pop     cx              ;
 41865                                          pop     ax              ;
 41866                                          je	short copyblock_check
 41867                                  %endif
 41868                                  	; 10/09/2023
 41869 0000416E 57                      	push	di
 41870 0000416F BF[CB4C]                	mov	di,szCommon	; always do "common" blocks
 41871 00004172 E81602                  	call	comp_names_x	; (comp_names_safe)
 41872 00004175 5F                      	pop	di
 41873 00004176 740F                    	je	short copyblock_check
 41874                                  
 41875 00004178 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 41876 0000417A 7414                            jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 41877 0000417C 57                              push    di              ;
 41878 0000417D 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 41879 0000417F 1E                              push    ds              ;
 41880 00004180 06                              push    es              ;
 41881 00004181 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 41882 00004182 E8E501                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 41883 00004185 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 41884 00004186 5F                              pop     di              ;
 41885                                  copyblock_check:
 41886 00004187 7217                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 41887 00004189 7505                            jne	short copyblock_skip ;
 41888 0000418B E85A04                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 41889 0000418E EBD7                            jmp	short copyblock_loop
 41890                                  
 41891                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 41892 00004190 E85504                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 41893 00004193 E87804                          call    get_char        ;
 41894 00004196 7208                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 41895 00004198 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 41896 0000419A 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 41897 0000419C 74D0                            je	short copyblock_begin
 41898 0000419E EBF0                            jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 41899                                  ;
 41900                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 41901                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 41902                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 41903                                  ;
 41904                                  move_config:
 41905 000041A0 89F9                            mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 41906 000041A2 51                              push    cx              ;
 41907                                  ;
 41908                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 41909                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 41910                                  ;
 41911                                   	;mov	cx,7
 41912 000041A3 B90700                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 41913 000041A6 BE[BE4C]                        mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 41914 000041A9 47                              inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 41915                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 41916                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 41917                                  copy_boot: 
 41918                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 41919 000041AA 2E                              cs
 41920 000041AB AC                      	lodsb
 41921 000041AC 8805                    	mov     [di],al         ;
 41922 000041AE 47                              inc     di              ;
 41923 000041AF E2F9                            loop    copy_boot       ;
 41924                                  
 41925 000041B1 06                              push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 41926                                          ;mov	cx,128-7	; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 41927                                  	; 04/01/2023
 41928 000041B2 B179                    	mov	cl,128-7
 41929 000041B4 2E8B36[884C]            	mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 41930 000041B9 09F6                            or      si,si           ; valid?
 41931 000041BB 7505                            jnz	short l1	; yes
 41932 000041BD 0E                              push    cs              ;
 41933 000041BE 07                              pop     es              ;
 41934 000041BF BE[CB4C]                        mov     si,szCommon
 41935 000041C2 268A04                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 41936 000041C5 E8B205                          call    any_delim       ;
 41937 000041C8 7406                            je	short l2	;
 41938 000041CA 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 41939 000041CC 46                              inc     si              ;
 41940 000041CD 47                              inc     di              ;
 41941 000041CE E2F2                            loop    l1              ;
 41942 000041D0 C6050A                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 41943 000041D3 07                              pop     es              ;
 41944                                  
 41945                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 41946                                  
 41947 000041D4 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 41948 000041D6 2E893E[6019]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 41949 000041DB 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 41950 000041DD 59                              pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 41951                                  
 41952 000041DE 51                              push    cx              ;
 41953 000041DF F3A4                            rep     movsb           ; moved!
 41954 000041E1 59                              pop     cx              ;
 41955 000041E2 8CD8                            mov     ax,ds           ;
 41956 000041E4 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 41957                                  
 41958                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 41959                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 41960                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 41961                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 41962                                  ;   is empty.
 41963                                  
 41964 000041E5 06                              push    es              ;
 41965 000041E6 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 41966 000041E8 46                              inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 41967 000041E9 26C606000000                    mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 41968 000041EF E82600                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 41969 000041F2 07                              pop     es
 41970                                  
 41971                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 41972                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 41973                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 41974                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 41975                                  
 41976                                  menu_done:
 41977 000041F3 803E[7D4C]00                    cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 41978 000041F8 7415                            je	short menu_exit	;
 41979 000041FA 06                              push    es              ;
 41980 000041FB B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 41981 000041FE 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 41982 00004200 A1[834C]                        mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 41983 00004203 26A34E00                        mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 41984 00004207 A0[824C]                        mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 41985 0000420A 26A26200                        mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 41986 0000420E 07                              pop     es              ;
 41987                                  menu_exit:
 41988 0000420F 890E[5603]                      mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 41989 00004213 890E[5803]                      mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 41990                                          ; 10/09/2023 (*) - Erdogan Tan
 41991                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:46D3h
 41992                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:491Ah
 41993                                  	;sub	si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 41994 00004217 C3                      	retn
 41995                                  
 41996                                  ; (*) NOTE: MSDOS 6.0 source code (SYSINIT2.ASM) contains 'sub si,si' at this
 41997                                  ;	position (then 'retn' just after it)
 41998                                  ;	but MSDOS 6.21 and PCDOS 7.1 SYSINITs contain only 'retn' here.
 41999                                  
 42000                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42001                                  ;
 42002                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 42003                                  ;
 42004                                  ;   INPUT
 42005                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 42006                                  ;
 42007                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42008                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 42009                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 42010                                  ;
 42011                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42012                                  ;       None
 42013                                  ;
 42014                                  ;   NOTES
 42015                                  ;       None
 42016                                  ;
 42017                                  ;   HISTORY
 42018                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42019                                  ;
 42020                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42021                                  
 42022                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 42023                                  	; (SYSINIT:46D4h)
 42024                                  
 42025                                  copy_envvar:
 42026 00004218 51                              push    cx              ;
 42027 00004219 56                              push    si              ;
 42028 0000421A 1E                              push    ds              ;
 42029 0000421B 06                              push    es              ;
 42030 0000421C 06                              push    es              ;
 42031 0000421D 8E06[6219]                      mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 42032 00004221 1F                              pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 42033                                  
 42034                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 42035                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 42036                                  ;   config.sys line)
 42037                                  ;
 42038                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 42039                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 42040                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 42041                                  
 42042 00004222 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ;
 42043                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 42044 00004224 AC                              lodsb                   ;
 42045 00004225 08C0                            or      al,al           ; NULL?
 42046                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 42047 00004227 746B                            jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 42048 00004229 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr           ;
 42049                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 42050 0000422B 7467                            je	short copy_envexit
 42051 0000422D 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf           ;
 42052                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 42053 0000422F 7463                            je	short copy_envexit
 42054 00004231 41                              inc     cx              ;
 42055 00004232 3C3D                            cmp     al,'='          ;
 42056 00004234 75EE                            jne	short copy_varlen
 42057 00004236 B000                            mov     al,0            ;
 42058 00004238 8A24                            mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 42059 0000423A 29CE                            sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 42060 0000423C 49                              dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 42061 0000423D 29FF                            sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 42062                                  copy_varsrch:
 42063 0000423F 263805                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 42064 00004242 7425                            je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 42065 00004244 89FB                            mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 42066 00004246 51                              push    cx              ;
 42067 00004247 56                              push    si              ;
 42068 00004248 F3A6                            repe    cmpsb           ;
 42069 0000424A 5E                              pop     si              ;
 42070 0000424B 59                              pop     cx              ;
 42071 0000424C 7531                            jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 42072 0000424E 26803D3D                        cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 42073 00004252 752B                            jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 42074                                  
 42075                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 42076                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 42077                                  
 42078 00004254 B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 42079 00004257 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 42080 00004259 56                              push    si              ;
 42081 0000425A 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 42082 0000425C 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ;
 42083 0000425E 2E8B0E[6019]                    mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 42084 00004263 29F1                            sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 42085                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 42086                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 42087                                  
 42088 00004265 F3                      	rep	; 0F3h
 42089 00004266 26                      	es	; 26h
 42090 00004267 A4                      	movsb	; 0A4h
 42091                                  
 42092 00004268 5E                      	pop     si
 42093                                  copy_envprep:
 42094 00004269 80FC0D                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 42095 0000426C 741D                            je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 42096 0000426E 80FC0A                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 42097 00004271 7418                            je	short copy_envdel
 42098                                          ;jmp	short copy_envloop
 42099                                  	; 04/01/2023
 42100                                  copy_envloop:                  ;
 42101 00004273 AC                      	lodsb                   ;
 42102 00004274 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr           ;
 42103 00004276 7410                    	je	short copy_envdone
 42104 00004278 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf           ;
 42105 0000427A 740C                    	je	short copy_envdone
 42106 0000427C AA                      	stosb                   ;
 42107 0000427D EBF4                    	jmp	short copy_envloop
 42108                                  
 42109                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 42110 0000427F 51                              push    cx              ;
 42111 00004280 B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 42112 00004283 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ;
 42113 00004285 59                              pop     cx              ;
 42114 00004286 EBB7                            jmp	short copy_varsrch
 42115                                  
 42116                                  	; 04/01/2023
 42117                                  ;copy_envloop:                  ;
 42118                                  ;	lodsb                   ;
 42119                                  ;	cmp	al,cr           ;
 42120                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 42121                                  ;	cmp	al,lf           ;
 42122                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 42123                                  ;	stosb                   ;
 42124                                  ;	jmp	short copy_envloop
 42125                                  
 42126                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 42127 00004288 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 42128 0000428A AA                              stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 42129                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 42130 0000428B 268805                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 42131 0000428E 2E893E[6019]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 42132                                  	; 10/09/2023 (x) - Erdogan Tan
 42133 00004293 F9                      	stc ; in order to clear carry flag via cmc (compact code trick!)
 42134                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 42135 00004294 F5                      	cmc ; (x) ; reverse carry flag status (je -> cf=1)
 42136 00004295 07                              pop     es              ;
 42137 00004296 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 42138 00004297 5E                              pop     si              ;
 42139 00004298 59                              pop     cx              ;
 42140                                  
 42141                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 42142 00004299 C3                              retn
 42143                                  
 42144                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42145                                  ;
 42146                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 42147                                  ;
 42148                                  ;   INPUT
 42149                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 42150                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 42151                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 42152                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 42153                                  ;
 42154                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42155                                  ;       Same as above
 42156                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 42157                                  ;
 42158                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42159                                  ;       All
 42160                                  ;
 42161                                  ;   NOTES
 42162                                  ;       None
 42163                                  ;
 42164                                  ;   HISTORY
 42165                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42166                                  ;
 42167                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42168                                  
 42169                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 42170                                  	; (SYSINIT:4759h)
 42171                                  
 42172                                  copy_block:
 42173 0000429A E87103                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 42174 0000429D 72FA                            jc	short copy_done	;
 42175 0000429F 247F                    	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 42176 000042A1 3C5B                    	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 42177 000042A3 74F4                            je	short copy_done ;
 42178                                  
 42179 000042A5 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 42180 000042A7 88E0                            mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 42181 000042A9 753A                            jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 42182                                  
 42183                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 42184                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 42185                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 42186                                  
 42187 000042AB 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 42188 000042B0 57                              push    di              ;
 42189                                  
 42190 000042B1 BF[C64C]                        mov     di,szMenu
 42191 000042B4 E8D400                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 42192 000042B7 7426                            je	short copy_skip	;
 42193                                  
 42194 000042B9 BF[CB4C]                        mov     di,szCommon
 42195 000042BC E8CC00                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 42196 000042BF 741E                            je	short copy_skip	;
 42197                                  
 42198 000042C1 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 42199 000042C3 E86400                          call    srch_block      ;
 42200 000042C6 89FA                            mov     dx,di           ;
 42201                                  	; 10/09/2023
 42202                                  	;pop    di              ;
 42203 000042C8 7514                            jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 42204 000042CA 5F                      	pop	di  ; 10/09/2023
 42205 000042CB 51                              push    cx              ;
 42206 000042CC 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ;
 42207 000042CE 56                              push    si              ;
 42208 000042CF 4A                              dec     dx              ;
 42209 000042D0 89D6                            mov     si,dx           ;
 42210 000042D2 E80E03                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 42211 000042D5 E8C2FF                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 42212 000042D8 5E                              pop     si              ;
 42213 000042D9 59                              pop     cx              ;

 42215 000042DC EB2B                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 42216                                  
 42217                                  copy_error:
 42218                                  	; 10/09/2023
 42219 000042DE F8                      	clc
 42220                                  copy_skip:
 42221 000042DF 5F                              pop     di
 42222                                  ;copy_error:
 42223                                  	; 10/09/2023 (cf=0)
 42224                                  	;clc                    ;

 42226 000042E3 EB24                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 42227                                  
 42228                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 42229                                  
 42230                                  copy_line:

 42232 000042E7 47                              inc     di              ;
 42233 000042E8 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 42234 000042EA 721D                            jb	short copy_nextline ; no

 42236 000042F2 7409                            je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 42237 000042F4 E81700                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 42238 000042F7 891D                            mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code

 42244 00004300 7297                            jc	short copy_done ; end of file

 42246 00004304 47                              inc     di              ;
 42247                                  copy_next:

 42249 00004307 75F4                            jne	short copy_loop	; nope

 42259                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42260                                  ;
 42261                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 42262                                  ;
 42263                                  ;   INPUT
 42264                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 42265                                  ;
 42266                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42267                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 42268                                  ;
 42269                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42270                                  ;       DX
 42271                                  ;
 42272                                  ;   NOTES
 42273                                  ;       None
 42274                                  ;
 42275                                  ;   HISTORY
 42276                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42277                                  ;
 42278                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42279                                  
 42280                                  get_linenum:
 42281 0000430E 50                              push    ax              ;
 42282 0000430F 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 42283 00004311 51                              push    cx              ;
 42284 00004312 89F2                            mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 42285 00004314 56                              push    si              ;
 42286 00004315 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 42287 0000431A 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 42288                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 42289 0000431C E8C402                          call    skip_line       ;
 42290 0000431F 7205                            jc	short get_linenum_done
 42291 00004321 43                              inc     bx              ;
 42292 00004322 39D6                            cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 42293 00004324 72F6                            jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 42294                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 42295 00004326 5E                              pop     si              ;
 42296 00004327 59                              pop     cx              ;
 42297 00004328 58                              pop     ax              ;
 42298 00004329 C3                              retn
 42299                                  
 42300                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42301                                  ;
 42302                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 42303                                  ;
 42304                                  ;   INPUT
 42305                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 42306                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 42307                                  ;
 42308                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42309                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 42310                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 42311                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 42312                                  ;
 42313                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42314                                  ;       None
 42315                                  ;
 42316                                  ;   NOTES
 42317                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 42318                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 42319                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 42320                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 42321                                  ;
 42322                                  ;   HISTORY
 42323                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42324                                  ;
 42325                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42326                                  
 42327                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 42328 0000432A 50                              push    ax              ;
 42329 0000432B 51                              push    cx              ;
 42330 0000432C 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 42331 00004331 56                              push    si              ;
 42332 00004332 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 42333 00004334 1E                              push    ds              ;
 42334 00004335 06                              push    es              ;
 42335 00004336 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 42336 00004337 E80900                          call    find_block      ;
 42337 0000433A 89F7                            mov     di,si           ;
 42338 0000433C 89CB                            mov     bx,cx           ;
 42339 0000433E 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 42340 0000433F 5E                              pop     si              ;
 42341 00004340 59                              pop     cx              ;
 42342 00004341 58                              pop     ax              ;
 42343                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 42344 00004342 C3                              retn			;
 42345                                  
 42346                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42347                                  ;
 42348                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 42349                                  ;
 42350                                  ;   INPUT
 42351                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 42352                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 42353                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 42354                                  ;
 42355                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42356                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 42357                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 42358                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 42359                                  ;
 42360                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42361                                  ;       AX
 42362                                  ;
 42363                                  ;   NOTES
 42364                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 42365                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 42366                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 42367                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 42368                                  ;
 42369                                  ;   HISTORY
 42370                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42371                                  ;
 42372                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42373                                  
 42374                                  find_block:
 42375 00004343 E8C802                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 42376 00004346 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 42377 00004348 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 42378 0000434A 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 42379 0000434C 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 42380 0000434E 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 42381 00004350 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 42382 00004352 2E800E[6519]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 42383 00004358 EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
 42384                                  check_line:
 42385 0000435A 2E800E[6519]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 42386 00004360 E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 42387 00004363 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 42388                                  next_line:
 42389 00004365 E88002                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 42390 00004368 EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 42391                                  ;find_exit:
 42392                                  ;	retn
 42393                                  
 42394                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42395                                  ;
 42396                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 42397                                  ;
 42398                                  ;   INPUT
 42399                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 42400                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 42401                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 42402                                  ;
 42403                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42404                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 42405                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 42406                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 42407                                  ;
 42408                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42409                                  ;       AX
 42410                                  ;
 42411                                  ;   NOTES
 42412                                  ;       None
 42413                                  ;
 42414                                  ;   HISTORY
 42415                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42416                                  ;
 42417                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42418                                  
 42419                                  comp_names:
 42420 0000436A 57                              push    di              ;
 42421                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 42422 0000436B E8A002                          call    get_char        ;
 42423 0000436E 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 42424 00004370 E80704                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 42425 00004373 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 42426 00004375 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 42427 00004377 47                              inc     di              ;
 42428 00004378 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 42429                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 42430 0000437B 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 42431 0000437D 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 42432 0000437F F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 42433                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 42434 00004380 5F                              pop     di              ;
 42435 00004381 C3                              retn			;
 42436                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 42437 00004382 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 42438 00004384 E8F303                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 42439 00004387 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 42440 00004389 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 42441                                  
 42442                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42443                                  
 42444                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 42445                                  comp_names_x:
 42446                                  	;
 42447                                  comp_names_safe:
 42448 0000438B 50                              push    ax
 42449 0000438C 51                              push    cx
 42450 0000438D 56                              push	si
 42451 0000438E 1E                              push    ds
 42452 0000438F 0E                              push    cs
 42453 00004390 1F                              pop     ds
 42454 00004391 E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 42455 00004394 1F                              pop     ds
 42456 00004395 5E                      	pop	si
 42457 00004396 59                              pop     cx
 42458 00004397 58                              pop     ax
 42459 00004398 C3                              retn

 42461                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42462                                  ;
 42463                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 42464                                  ;
 42465                                  ;   INPUT
 42466                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 42467                                  ;
 42468                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42469                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 42470                                  ;
 42471                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42472                                  ;       None
 42473                                  ;
 42474                                  ;   NOTES
 42475                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 42476                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 42477                                  ;
 42478                                  ;   HISTORY
 42479                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42480                                  ;
 42481                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42482                                  
 42483                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 42484                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 42485                                  
 42486                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 42487 00004399 50                              push    ax              ;
 42488 0000439A 53                              push    bx              ;
 42489 0000439B 51                              push    cx              ;
 42490 0000439C 52                              push    dx              ;
 42491 0000439D 56                              push    si              ;
 42492 0000439E B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 42493 000043A0 8A3E[7D4C]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 42494 000043A4 CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 42495 000043A6 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 42496 000043A7 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 42497 000043A9 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 42498 000043AB 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 42499 000043AE B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 42500 000043B0 CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 42501 000043B2 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 42502 000043B4 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 42503 000043B6 8A26[7C4C]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 42504 000043BA 3A1E[864C]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 42505 000043BE 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 42506 000043C0 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 42507 000043C3 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 42508 000043C5 B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 42509 000043C7 D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 42510 000043C9 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 42511 000043CB 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 42512 000043CD 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 42513                                  print_other:                    ;
 42514 000043D0 B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 42515 000043D2 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 42516 000043D4 8BBF[AA4C]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 42517 000043D8 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 42518 000043DA 8A3E[7D4C]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 42519 000043DE B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 42520 000043E0 B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 42521 000043E3 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42522 000043E5 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 42523 000043E7 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 42524 000043E9 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42525                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 42526 000043EB B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 42527 000043EE CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 42528 000043F0 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 42529 000043F2 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 42530 000043F4 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42531                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 42532 000043F6 B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 42533 000043F9 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 42534 000043FB FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 42535 000043FD B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 42536 000043FF CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42537 00004401 06                              push    es              ;
 42538                                  print_loop:                     ;
 42539 00004402 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 42540 00004405 47                              inc     di              ;
 42541 00004406 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 42542 00004408 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 42543 0000440A B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 42544                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 42545 0000440C 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 42546 0000440E 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 42547 00004410 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 42548 00004412 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 42549 00004414 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 42550 00004416 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42551 00004418 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 42552 0000441A 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 42553 0000441D 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 42554 0000441F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 42555 00004421 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42556 00004423 EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 42557                                  print_done:                     ;
 42558 00004425 07                              pop     es              ;
 42559 00004426 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 42560 00004427 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 42561 00004429 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 42562 0000442B 5E                              pop     si              ;
 42563 0000442C 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 42564 0000442D 59                              pop     cx              ;
 42565 0000442E 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 42566 0000442F 58                              pop     ax              ;
 42567 00004430 C3                              retn			;
 42568                                  
 42569                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42570                                  ;
 42571                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 42572                                  ;
 42573                                  ;   INPUT
 42574                                  ;       None
 42575                                  ;
 42576                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42577                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 42578                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 42579                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 42580                                  ;
 42581                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42582                                  ;       None
 42583                                  ;
 42584                                  ;   NOTES
 42585                                  ;       None
 42586                                  ;
 42587                                  ;   HISTORY
 42588                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42589                                  ;
 42590                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42591                                  
 42592                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 42593 00004431 8A1E[864C]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 42594 00004435 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 42595 00004437 E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 42596 0000443A E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 42597 0000443D 803E[8A4C]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 42598 00004442 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 42599 00004444 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 42600 00004446 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 42601 00004448 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 42602                                  check_time:
 42603 0000444A A0[8A4C]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 42604 0000444D 2A06[8B4C]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 42605 00004451 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 42606 00004453 800E[854C]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 42607 00004458 C606[8B4C]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 42608 0000445D E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 42609                                  show_time:
 42610 00004460 53                              push    bx              ;
 42611 00004461 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 42612 00004463 8A3E[7D4C]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 42613 00004467 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 42614 00004469 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42615 0000446B 52                              push    dx              ;
 42616 0000446C 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 42617 0000446F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 42618 00004471 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42619 00004473 BA[2753]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 42620 00004476 E8DB05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 42621 00004479 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 42622 0000447B 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 42623 0000447C B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 42624 0000447E F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 42625 00004480 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 42626 00004482 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 42627 00004484 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 42628 00004486 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 42629 00004488 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 42630 0000448A 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 42631 0000448C B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 42632 0000448E CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 42633 00004490 5A                              pop     dx
 42634 00004491 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 42635 00004493 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42636 00004495 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 42637                                  input_key:
 42638 00004496 B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 42639 00004498 B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 42640 0000449A CD21                            int     21h             ;
 42641 0000449C 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 42642 0000449E 803E[8A4C]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 42643 000044A3 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 42644 000044A5 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 42645 000044A7 CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 42646 000044A9 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 42647 000044AB 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 42648 000044AD 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 42649 000044AF 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 42650 000044B1 B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 42651                                  got_time:
 42652 000044B3 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 42653 000044B5 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 42654 000044B7 0036[8B4C]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 42655 000044BB EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 42656                                  got_key:
 42657 000044BD 50                              push    ax              ;
 42658 000044BE B8FFFF                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 42659 000044C1 8706[8A4C]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 42660 000044C5 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 42661 000044C7 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 42662 000044C9 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 42663 000044CA B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 42664 000044CD 8B1E[7C4C]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 42665 000044D1 B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 42666 000044D4 CD10                            int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 42667 000044D6 5B                              pop     bx   		;
 42668                                  
 42669                                  timeout_disabled:

 42671 000044D8 08C0                            or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 42672 000044DA 755A                            jnz	short normal_key ; no
 42673 000044DC CD21                            int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 42674 000044DE 74B6                            jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 42675                                  
 42676 000044E0 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 42677 000044E2 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no

 42679 000044E7 76AD                            jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it

 42682 000044F0 FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item

 42684                                  not_up:

 42687 000044F8 3A1E[874C]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?

 42689 000044FE FE06[864C]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;

 42691 00004505 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 42692                                  print1:

 42694                                  print2:

 42697                                  to_input_key:
 42698 0000450E EB86                            jmp	short input_key ; 10/09/2023
 42699                                  not_down:
 42700 00004510 F606[814C]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 42701 00004515 75F7                            jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5

 42707                                  not_f8:
 42708 00004526 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 42709 00004528 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 42710                                  	; 02/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 42711                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:49EBh
 42712                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4C32h)

 42739

 42861                                  ;
 42862                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 42863                                  ;
 42864                                  ;   INPUT
 42865                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 42866                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 42867                                  ;
 42868                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42869                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 42870                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 42871                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 42872                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 42873                                  ;
 42874                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42875                                  ;       AX
 42876                                  ;
 42877                                  ;   NOTES
 42878                                  ;       None
 42879                                  ;
 42880                                  ;   HISTORY
 42881                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42882                                  ;
 42883                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42884                                  
 42885                                  skip_token:
 42886 000045BE E84D00                          call    get_char
 42887 000045C1 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 42888 000045C3 E8B401                          call    any_delim
 42889 000045C6 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 42890                                  skip_check_eol:
 42891 000045C8 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 42892 000045CA 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 42893 000045CC 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 42894 000045CE 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 42895 000045D0 F8                              clc
 42896                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 42897 000045D1 C3                      	retn
 42898                                  skip_token_eol:
 42899 000045D2 F9                              stc
 42900                                  skip_token_done:
 42901 000045D3 C3                              retn
 42902                                  
 42903                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42904                                  ;
 42905                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 42906                                  ;
 42907                                  ;   INPUT
 42908                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 42909                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 42910                                  ;
 42911                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42912                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 42913                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 42914                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 42915                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 42916                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 42917                                  ;
 42918                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42919                                  ;       AX
 42920                                  ;
 42921                                  ;   NOTES
 42922                                  ;       None
 42923                                  ;
 42924                                  ;   HISTORY
 42925                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42926                                  ;
 42927                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42928                                  
 42929                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 42930 000045D4 E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 42931 000045D7 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 42932 000045DA 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 42933 000045DC E8AB01                          call    delim           ;
 42934 000045DF 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 42935 000045E1 EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 42936                                  
 42937                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42938                                  ;
 42939                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 42940                                  ;
 42941                                  ;   INPUT
 42942                                  ;       AL == last character read
 42943                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 42944                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 42945                                  ;
 42946                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42947                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 42948                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 42949                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 42950                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 42951                                  ;
 42952                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42953                                  ;       AX
 42954                                  ;
 42955                                  ;   NOTES
 42956                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 42957                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 42958                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 42959                                  ;
 42960                                  ;   HISTORY
 42961                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42962                                  ;
 42963                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42964                                  
 42965                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 42966                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 42967                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 42968                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 42969                                       
 42970                                  	; fall into skip_line
 42971                                  
 42972                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42973                                  ;
 42974                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 42975                                  ;
 42976                                  ;   INPUT
 42977                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 42978                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 42979                                  ;
 42980                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42981                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 42982                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 42983                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 42984                                  ;
 42985                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42986                                  ;       AX
 42987                                  ;
 42988                                  ;   NOTES
 42989                                  ;       None
 42990                                  ;
 42991                                  ;   HISTORY
 42992                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42993                                  ;
 42994                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42995                                  
 42996                                  skip_line:
 42997 000045E3 E82800                          call    get_char
 42998 000045E6 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 42999                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 43000 000045E8 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah

 43002                                  skip_line_done:
 43003                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 43004 000045EC C3                              retn

 43007                                  ;
 43008                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 43009                                  ;
 43010                                  ;   INPUT

 43012                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys

 43014                                  ;   OUTPUT

 43016                                  ;       BX == binary #

 43033                                  get_number:
 43034 000045ED 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 43035                                  num_loop:
 43036 000045EF E81C00                          call    get_char        ;
 43037 000045F2 72F8                            jc	short num_done	;

 43041 000045FA 77F0                            ja	short num_done	;
 43042 000045FC 50                              push    ax              ;
 43043 000045FD B80A00                          mov     ax,10           ;
 43044 00004600 52                              push    dx              ;
 43045 00004601 F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 43046 00004603 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 43047 00004604 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 43048 00004606 58                              pop     ax              ;
 43049 00004607 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 43050 00004609 98                              cbw                     ;
 43051 0000460A 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 43052 0000460C EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;
 43053

 43055                                  ;num_done:
 43056                                          ;retn

 43058                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43059                                  ;
 43060                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 43061                                  ;
 43062                                  ;   INPUT
 43063                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 43064                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 43065                                  ;
 43066                                  ;   OUTPUT

 43068                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 43069                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 43070                                  ;

 43072                                  ;       AX

 43084 00004611 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 43085                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 43086 00004613 26                      	es	
 43087 00004614 AC                      	lodsb
 43088 00004615 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 43089 00004617 C3                              retn			;
 43090                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 43091 00004618 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 43092                                  nearby_ret:
