 43095                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43096                                  ;
 43097                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 43098                                  ;
 43099                                  ;   INPUT
 43100                                  ;       AL == current command code
 43101                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 43102                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 43103                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 43104                                  ;
 43105                                  ;   OUTPUT
 43106                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 43107                                  ;
 43108                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 43109                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 43110                                  ;
 43111                                  ;   NOTES
 43112                                  ;       None
 43113                                  ;
 43114                                  ;   HISTORY
 43115                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 43116                                  ;
 43117                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43118                                  
 43119                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 43120                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 43121                                  
 43122                                  	; 12/12/2022
 43123                                  query_user:
 43124 0000461C F606[854C]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 43125                                  	; 01/01/2023
 43126 00004621 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 43127 00004623 E9B900                  	jmp	skip_all
 43128                                  	; 12/12/2022
 43129                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 43130                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 43131                                  qu_1:
 43132 00004626 F606[854C]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 43133 0000462B 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 43134 0000462D 50                              push    ax                      ;
 43135 0000462E A0[6419]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 43136 00004631 F606[854C]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 43137 00004636 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 43138 00004638 A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 43139                                  	; 01/01/2023
 43140 0000463A 7502                    	jnz	short query_all		;
 43141                                  	; 12/12/2022
 43142                                  	;;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 43143                                  	;jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 43144                                  
 43145                                  	; 01/01/2023
 43146 0000463C 58                      	pop	ax
 43147 0000463D C3                      	retn
 43148                                  
 43149                                  query_all:
 43150                                  
 43151                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 43152                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 43153                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 43154                                  
 43155 0000463E 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 43156 0000463F BA[8253]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 43157 00004642 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 43158 00004644 7450                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 43159                                  
 43160 00004646 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 43161 00004648 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 43162 0000464A BF[D24C]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 43163                                  find_match:                             ;
 43164 0000464D 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 43165 0000464F 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 43166 00004651 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 43167 00004653 47                              inc     di                      ;
 43168 00004654 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 43169 00004656 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 43170 00004658 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 43171                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 43172 0000465B EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 43173                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 43174 0000465D 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 43175 00004660 B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 43176 00004662 B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 43177                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 43178 00004664 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 43179 00004666 47                              inc     di                      ;
 43180 00004667 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 43181 00004669 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 43182 0000466B E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 43183 0000466D B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 43184 0000466F 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 43185 00004672 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 43186 00004674 B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 43187                                  cmd_notset:
 43188 00004676 CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 43189                                  line_print:                             ;
 43190                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 43191 00004678 26                              es
 43192 00004679 AC                      	lodsb
 43193 0000467A 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 43194 0000467C 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 43195 0000467E B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 43196                                  non_null:                               ;

 43316                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 43317                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 43318                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 43319                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 43320                                  
 43321                                  disable_autoexec:
 43322                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 43323                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 43324                                  
 43325 00004717 F606[854C]04            	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4

 43332 00004730 BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 43333                                  dae_1:

 43335 00004733 A0[BA4B]                        mov	al,[def_swchr]

 43337 00004736 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; anything there?

 43499                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 43500                                  ;
 43501                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43502                                  
 43503                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 43504                                  
 43505                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 43506                                  	; (SYSINIT:4C7Eh)
 43507                                  mapcase:
 43508 000047C6 51                      	push	cx
 43509 000047C7 56                      	push	si
 43510 000047C8 1E                      	push	ds
 43511                                  
 43512 000047C9 06                      	push	es
 43513 000047CA 1F                      	pop	ds
 43514                                  
 43515                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 43516                                  
 43517                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 43518                                  
 43519                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 43520 000047CB 88C3                    	mov	bl,al			; same cmd code this line
 43521                                  ;else
 43522                                  ;	xor	si,si
 43523                                  ;endif
 43524                                  	; 02/11/2022
 43525                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 43526                                  	;xor	si, si
 43527                                  
 43528                                  convloop:
 43529 000047CD AC                      	lodsb
 43530 000047CE 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 43531 000047D0 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 43532 000047D2 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 43533 000047D4 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 43534 000047D6 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 43535 000047D8 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 43536                                  noconv:
 43537                                  
 43538                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 43539                                  
 43540                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 43541                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 43542                                  
 43543                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 43544                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 43545                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 43546                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 43547                                  ;
 43548 000047DB 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 43549 000047DE 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 43550 000047E0 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 43551 000047E2 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes
 43552                                  check_eol:
 43553 000047E4 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 43554 000047E6 7406                    	je	short convdone
 43555 000047E8 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 43556 000047EA 7402                    	je	short convdone
 43557                                  ;endif
 43558                                  	; 02/11/2022
 43559 000047EC E2DF                    	loop	convloop
 43560                                  convdone:
 43561 000047EE 1F                      	pop	ds
 43562 000047EF 5E                      	pop	si
 43563 000047F0 59                      	pop	cx
 43564 000047F1 C3                      	retn

 43686                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43687                                  ;
 43688                                  ; procedure : getnum
 43689                                  ;
 43690                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 43691                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 43692                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 43693                                  ;
 43694                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43695                                  
 43696                                  getnum:
 43697 00004865 53                      	push	bx
 43698 00004866 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 43699                                  b2:
 43700 00004868 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 43701 0000486B 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 43702                                  
 43703 0000486D 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 43704 0000486E 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 43705                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 43706                                  	; 12/12/2022
 43707 0000486F B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 43708 00004871 F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 43709 00004873 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 43710 00004874 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 43711 00004876 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 43712 00004879 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 43713                                  
 43714 0000487B 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 43715                                  
 43716 0000487C E830FF                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 43717 0000487F 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 43718 00004881 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 43719 00004883 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 43720 00004885 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 43721 00004887 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 43722 00004889 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 43723 0000488B 7417                    	je	short b15
 43724 0000488D 2E3A06[AE02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 43725 00004892 7410                    	je	short b15
 43726 00004894 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 43727                                  	; 12/12/2022
 43728                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 43729                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 43730                                  	;nop
 43731 00004896 740C                    	je	short b15
 43732 00004898 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 43733 0000489A 7408                    	je	short b15
 43734 0000489C 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 43735 0000489E 7404                    	je	short b15
 43736 000048A0 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 43737 000048A2 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 43738                                  b15:
 43739 000048A4 2EFF06[5603]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 43740 000048A9 2EFF0E[5A03]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 43741                                  b1:
 43742 000048AE 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 43743 000048B0 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 43744 000048B2 5B                      	pop	bx
 43745 000048B3 C3                      	retn
 43746                                  badnum:
 43747                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 43748                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 43749 000048B4 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 43750                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 43751 000048B6 2EA2[AE02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 43752 000048BA 5B                      	pop	bx
 43753 000048BB F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 43754 000048BC C3                      	retn

 43757                                  
 43758                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 43759                                  
 43760                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43761                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 43762                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 43763                                  ;	si = 0
 43764                                  ;	ax = country id
 43765                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 43766                                  ;	bx = file handle
 43767                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 43768                                  ;
 43769                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 43770                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 43771                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 43772                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 43773                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43774                                  
 43775                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 43776                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 43777                                  
 43778                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 43779                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4FCAh)

 43782 000048BE 50                      	push	ax

 43786 000048C2 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx

 43807 000048E2 7532                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 43808

 44021                                  getcountrydestination:
 44022                                  
 44023                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44024                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 44025                                  ;
 44026                                  ;input: al - data id
 44027                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 44028                                  ;on return:
 44029                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 44030                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 44031                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44032                                  
 44033                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 44034                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 44035                                  
 44036                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 44037                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:50F9h)
 44038                                  
 44039 000049E2 51                      	push	cx
 44040                                  	;add	di,74
 44041 000049E3 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 44042                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 44043 000049E6 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 44044 000049E9 47                      	inc	di
 44045 000049EA 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 44046                                  
 44047                                  getcntrydest:
 44048 000049EB 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al
 44049 000049EE 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 44050                                  
 44051 000049F0 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 44052 000049F4 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 44053                                  
 44054 000049F6 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 44055 000049F9 EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 44056                                  
 44057                                  getcntrydest_1:
 44058                                  	;add	di,41
 44059 000049FB 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 44060                                  getcntrydest_loop:
 44061 000049FE E2EB                    	loop	getcntrydest
 44062 00004A00 F9                      	stc
 44063                                  	;jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 44064                                  getcntrydest_exit:
 44065                                  	; 10/09/2023
 44066 00004A01 59                      	pop	cx
 44067 00004A02 C3                      	retn
 44068                                  
 44069                                  getcntrydest_ok:
 44070                                  	; 10/09/2023
 44071 00004A03 47                      	inc	di
 44072                                  
 44073                                  ;	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;select country info?
 44074                                  ;	jne	short getcntrydest_ok1
 44075                                  ;

 44077                                  ;	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 44078

 44082

 44084                                  	;les	di,[es:di+1]		;get the destination in es:di
 44085                                  	; 10/09/2023
 44086 00004A08 26C43D                  	les	di,[es:di]
 44087                                  ;getcntrydest_exit:
 44088 00004A0B 59                      	pop	cx
 44089 00004A0C C3                      	retn
 44090                                  
 44091                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44092                                  
 44093                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 44094                                  
 44095                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44096                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 44097                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 44098                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 44099                                  ;
 44100                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 44101                                  ;	 be moved.
 44102                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 44103                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 44104                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 44105                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 44106                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 44107                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 44108                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44109                                  
 44110 00004A0D 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 44111 00004A0E B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 44112 00004A11 F9                      	stc
 44113 00004A12 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 44114 00004A14 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 44115 00004A15 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 44116                                  
 44117 00004A17 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 44118 00004A19 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 44119 00004A1B B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 44120 00004A1D F9                      	stc
 44121 00004A1E CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 44122                                  ricb_exit:
 44123 00004A20 C3                      	retn
 44124

 44126                                  
 44127                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 44128                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023
 44129                                  %if 0
 44130                                  
 44131                                  set_country_path:
 44132                                  
 44133                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44134                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 44135                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 44136                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 44137                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 44138                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 44139                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 44140                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44141                                  
 44142                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 44143                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 44144                                  
 44145                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 44146                                  	; (Retrodos v5.0 Pre-Works)
 44147                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:513Bh)
 44148                                  
 44149                                  	push	si
 44150                                  
 44151                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 44152                                  	push	es
 44153                                  	pop	ds
 44154                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 44155                                  
 44156                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 44157                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 44158                                  
 44159                                  	mov	al,[si]
 44160                                  	inc	si
 44161                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 44162                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 44163                                  
 44164                                  scp_default_drv:
 44165                                  	mov	ah,19h
 44166                                  	int	21h
 44167                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 44168                                  
 44169                                  scp_setdrv:
 44170                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 44171                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 44172                                  	mov	al,[si]
 44173                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 44174                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 44175                                  
 44176                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 44177                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 44178                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 44179                                  	; 04/01/2023
 44180                                  	jne	short scp_path
 44181                                  
 44182                                  scp_root_dir:
 44183                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 44184                                  scp_path:
 44185                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 44186                                  
 44187                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 44188                                  scpath_exit:
 44189                                  
 44190                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 44191                                  	push	es
 44192                                  	pop	ds
 44193                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 44194                                  
 44195                                  	pop	si
 44196                                  	retn
 44197                                  
 44198                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44199                                  
 44200                                  chk_drive_letter:
 44201                                  
 44202                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 44203                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 44204                                  ;carry set if not.
 44205                                  
 44206                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 44207                                  
 44208                                  	push	ax
 44209                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 44210                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 44211                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 44212                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 44213                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 44214                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 44215                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 44216                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 44217                                  	; 04/01/2023
 44218                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 44219                                  
 44220                                  cdletter_no:
 44221                                  	stc
 44222                                  cdletter_exit:
 44223                                  	pop	ax
 44224                                  	retn
 44225                                  
 44226                                  %endif
 44227                                  
 44228                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44229                                  
 44230                                  move_asciiz:
 44231                                  
 44232                                  ;in: ds:si -> source es:di -> target
 44233                                  ;out: copy the string until 0.
 44234                                  ;assumes there exists a 0.
 44235                                  
 44236                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 44237                                  	; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4F40h)
 44238                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:5187h)
 44239                                  
 44240                                  masciiz_loop:
 44241                                  	; 10/09/2023
 44242 00004A21 F604FF                  	test	byte [si],0FFh
 44243 00004A24 A4                      	movsb
 44244                                  	;cmp	byte [si-1],0	; was it 0?
 44245                                  	;jne	short masciiz_loop
 44246 00004A25 75FA                    	jnz	short masciiz_loop ; 10/09/2023
 44247 00004A27 C3                      	retn
 44248                                  
 44249                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 44250                                  
 44251                                  ;	ds:dx points to string to output (asciz)
 44252                                  ;
 44253                                  ;	prints <badld_pre> <string> <badld_post>
 44254                                  
 44255                                  badfil:
 44256 00004A28 0E                      	push	cs
 44257 00004A29 07                      	pop	es
 44258                                  
 44259 00004A2A 89D6                    	mov	si,dx
 44260                                  badload:
 44261 00004A2C BA[B350]                	mov	dx,badld_pre	; want to print config error
 44262 00004A2F BB[7050]                	mov	bx,crlfm
 44263                                  prnerr:
 44264 00004A32 0E                      	push	cs
 44265 00004A33 1F                      	pop	ds ; *
 44266 00004A34 E81D00                  	call	print
 44267                                  prn1:
 44268 00004A37 268A14                  	mov	dl,[es:si]
 44269 00004A3A 08D2                    	or	dl,dl
 44270 00004A3C 7407                    	jz	short prn2
 44271 00004A3E B402                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2 
 44272 00004A40 CD21                    	int	21h
 44273 00004A42 46                      	inc	si
 44274 00004A43 EBF2                    	jmp	short prn1
 44275                                  prn2:
 44276 00004A45 89DA                    	mov	dx,bx
 44277 00004A47 E80A00                  	call	print
 44278                                  	; 11/12/2022
 44279                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 44280 00004A4A 803E[5503]01            	cmp	byte [donotshownum],1
 44281                                  				; suppress line number when handling command.com
 44282                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:donotshownum],1

 44284

 44286                                  	;call	error_line

 44289                                  	;retn

 44292

 44297 00004A58 C3                      	retn

 44985                                  number3mod	equ (number3div % 16)
 44986                                  
 44987                                  %if (number3mod>0) & (number3mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 44988 00005408 00<rep 8h>              		times (16-number3mod) db 0
 44989                                  %endif
